5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adc.name: Rewind
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adc.description: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adc.tooltip: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369c.name: Primordial Burst
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369c.description: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369c.tooltip:
Blasts the target with primal magic to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.

Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5add.name: Bear Trap on a Rope
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5add.description:
Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled.

When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5add.tooltip:
Kled throws a bear trap that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and hooks onto the first enemy champion or large monster hit, granting True Sight. Deals 150% damage to minions passed through.

If Kled stays near a hooked enemy for {{ e3 }} seconds, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*2 }}) physical damage, yanks the enemy toward him, and slows the enemy by {{ e5 }}% for 1.5 seconds.

Dismounted: Becomes Pocket Pistol, a ranged ability that restores courage.

59f4a1c38bf5501e050f4c7e.name: Phoenix Stance
59f4a1c38bf5501e050f4c7e.description: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
59f4a1c38bf5501e050f4c7e.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae6.name: Caretaker's Shrine
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae6.description: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae6.tooltip:
Bard raises a health shrine that immediately offers {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health, but restores up to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health as it gathers power for 10 seconds. The shrine's effect also grants {{ e1 }}% decaying movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Bard can have up to {{ e3 }} shrines active at once, which remain until visited by an ally champion or crushed by an enemy champion.

Active Shrines: {{ f1 }} / {{ f2 }}

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366d.name: Living Shadow
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366d.description: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366d.tooltip:
Passive: Whenever Zed and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability, Zed gains {{ e3 }} energy. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.

Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for {{ e5 }} seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3317.name: Arctic Assault
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3317.description: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3317.tooltip: Sejuani charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362b.name: Mystic Shot
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362b.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362b.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by {{ e2 }} seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a0.name: Gatling Gun
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a0.description: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a0.tooltip:
Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage and reducing up to {{ e4 }} armor and magic resist.

Gatling Gun's damage is {{ e7 }}% physical, {{ e8 }}% magic.
Defense reductions last for {{ e6 }} seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361b.name: Fear Beyond Death
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361b.description: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361b.tooltip:
Urgot fires a chem-drill, impaling the first enemy champion hit. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows for {{ e4 }} seconds by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the victim's missing health.

If the victim falls below {{ e2 }}% health while impaled, Urgot may recast this ability, suppressing the victim and dragging them in for execution. Activates automatically if the target is below {{ e2 }}% at the end of the effect.

When Urgot executes a victim, nearby enemies flee in terror for {{ e0 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3647.name: Steadfast Presence
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3647.description: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3647.tooltip:
Passive: Poppy gains {{ f1 }} Armor and {{ f2 }} Magic Resist ({{ e3 }}% of Armor and Magic Resist). This bonus is doubled if Poppy is below 40% Health.

Active: For the next {{ e1 }} seconds, Poppy gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed. While Steadfast Presence is active, she stops enemy dashes in an area around her, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acc.name: Piercing Light
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acc.description: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acc.tooltip:
Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.

Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bd.name: Song of Celerity
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bd.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bd.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f1*100 }}% movement speed [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 ability power] for {{ e9 }} seconds (or until damaged) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Tempo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain {{ f3*100 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Sona's personal movement speed increase will always last at least {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3602.name: Righteous Fury
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3602.description: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage.  Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3602.tooltip:
Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on hit.

Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit.

In addition, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applies spell effects on attack to enemies near her target.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3246.name: Buster Shot
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3246.description: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3246.tooltip: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back {{ e2 }} distance.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f5.name: Force Pulse
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f5.description: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f5.tooltip:
Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.

Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second in a cone in front of him.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abd.name: Winds of War
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abd.description: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abd.tooltip:
Galio fires two windblasts that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

When the windblasts meet, they combine into a giant tornado that deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2.0*3 }}) plus (+{{ f9 }})% of enemies' maximum Health (max {{ e4 }} vs. monsters) as magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cf.name: Ethereal Chains
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cf.description: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cf.tooltip:
Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to LeBlanc, granting True Sight of the unit and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If the target remains shackled for {{ e2 }} seconds they are rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and take an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac5.name: Ki Burst
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac5.description: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac5.tooltip: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae3.name: Undertow
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae3.description: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae3.tooltip:
Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for up to {{ e3 }} seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e3.name: Pick A Card
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e3.description: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e3.tooltip:
Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.

Blue Card deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and restores {{ e6 }} Mana.

Red Card deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for 2.5 seconds.

Gold Card deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and stuns for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab3.name: Tempest / Cripple
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab3.description:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds.
Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab3.tooltip:
Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for {{ e5 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368f.name: Scatter the Weak
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368f.description: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368f.tooltip:
Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.

Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e8.name: Last Rites
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e8.description: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e8.tooltip:
Yorick's next basic attack deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and restores {{ f1 }} Health (doubled when below half Health). Last Rites will leave a grave if it kills the target.

When there are three or more graves nearby and Last Rites has been used, Yorick can cast Awakening to raise Mist Walkers from graves.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e5.name: Destiny
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e5.description: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e5.tooltip:
Grants True Sight all enemy champions on the map for {{ e1 }} seconds.

While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to {{ e4 }} units away in 1.5 seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364c.name: Weaver's Wall
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364c.description: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364c.tooltip:
Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.

Weaver's Wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.

59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c7f.name: Corrosive Charge
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c7f.description: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c7f.tooltip: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c8.name: Sanguine Pool
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c8.description: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c8.tooltip:
Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining a brief haste and becoming untargetable while slowing enemies above him by {{ e3 }}%.

Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [{{ e4 }}% of bonus Health] magic damage over the duration and heals himself for {{ e5 }}% of that amount.

Sanguine Pool can be cast while charging Tides of Blood.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3454.name: Golden Aegis
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3454.description: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3454.tooltip: Grants a shield that absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }} [{{ e6 }}% max Health] for each nearby enemy champion) damage for {{ e4 }} seconds, and slows surrounding enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360e.name: Urchin Strike
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360e.description: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360e.tooltip:
Fizz dashes through his target, dealing {{ a2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects.

Seastone Trident is applied to all enemy units Fizz passes through during his dash.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3635.name: Siphon of Destruction
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3635.description: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3635.tooltip:
Mordekaiser deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a cone.

For each Champion hit, he gains {{ e5 }}% maximum shield.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e8.name: Absolute Zero
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e8.description: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e8.tooltip:
Nunu channels for {{ e4 }} seconds, sapping the area of heat. Nearby enemies have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e2 }}% and their Attack Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}%. The Movement Speed slow increases to {{ e6 }}% over the duration of the channel.

Enemies caught in the area when the channel ends take up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, depending on how long Absolute Zero was channeled.
(Minimum Damage: {{ f2 }})

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3739.name: Decimating Smash
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3739.description: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.</font>
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3739.tooltip:
Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e8 }}% damage to minions) and briefly slows them.

If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f339a.name: Collateral Damage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339a.description: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339a.tooltip: Fires an explosive shell with such force that it knocks Graves back. The shell deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy hit. After hitting an enemy Champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage in a cone.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac2.name: Arcane Shift
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac2.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac2.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3728.name: Infected Cleaver
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3728.description: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3728.tooltip:
Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing {{ e2 }}% of the target's current health as magic damage (no less than {{ e1 }}) and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If the cleaver hits, {{ f1 }} health is refunded ({{ f2 }} if the cleaver kills).

Infected Cleaver deals no more than {{ e6 }} damage against monsters.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f7.name: Ricochet
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f7.description: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f7.tooltip:
Sivir's next {{ e4 }} basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage to the first target and {{ f2 }} physical damage to each subsequent target.

If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike.

Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f373c.name: Unstoppable Onslaught
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f373c.description: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f373c.tooltip:
Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.

When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocks up enemies in a small area for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for 3 seconds.

The damage increases to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) and the stun increases to {{ e6 }} seconds as Sion charges farther.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3308.name: Headbutt
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3308.description: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3308.tooltip: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking them back.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ea.name: Battle Roar
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ea.description:
Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken.

Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ea.tooltip:
Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for {{ e2 }}% of the damage he took in the last {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.

Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by {{ e5 }}%.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366f.name: Death Mark
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366f.description: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. If the Champion dies under Death Mark, Zed can gain a portion of their attack damage.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366f.tooltip:
Zed becomes untargetable and dashes to an enemy champion, marking them. After 3 seconds, the mark triggers, dealing physical damage equal to {{ a1 }} + {{ e2 }}% of all damage dealt to the target by Zed while the mark was active.

The dash leaves a shadow behind for {{ e4 }} seconds. Reactivating Death Mark causes Zed to switch positions with this shadow.

Reaper of Shadows: Zed reaps the shadow of the strongest foe slain under Death Mark, gaining {{ f2 }} attack damage. ({{ e0 }} + {{ e9 }}% of the victim's attack damage.)

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a9.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a9.description:
Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist.

Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a9.tooltip:
Active: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and ranged attacks.

The next attack in Cannon Stance reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist by {{ f3 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363e.name: Broken Wings
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363e.description: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363e.tooltip:
Riven strikes out in front of her in a short line. This ability may be re-cast {{ e4 }} additional times.

1st and 2nd Use: Slashes forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to all units she comes in contact with.
3rd Use: Leaps forward and slams the ground dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and knocking nearby enemies up. This leap can cross unpathable terrain.

Riven will target the unit your cursor is hovering over, or if no targets are present, Riven will simply strike the direction she is currently facing.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f1.name: Shadow Step
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f1.tooltip:
Kayn gains {{ e1 }}% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for {{ e2 }} seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Shadow Assassin: Gain more movement speed and slow immunity.

Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: {{ e6 }} seconds.
Immobilizing effects and spending more than {{ e3 }} consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364d.name: Tentacle Smash
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364d.description: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364d.tooltip:
Passive: Slam damage is increased by {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}).

Active: Illaoi swings her idol, causing a Tentacle to Slam forward.

59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c84.name: Conquering Sands
59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c84.description: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c84.tooltip:
Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a {{ e2 }}% slow for 1 second.

Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372a.name: Masochism
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372a.description: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372a.tooltip:
Passive: When Dr. Mundo suffers magic damage or pays a health cost, his magic resist is increased by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds, up to a maximum of {{ f3*100 }}%.

Active: Dr. Mundo's next basic attack will headbutt the enemy, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage ({{ e1 }}% of maximum health) at the cost of {{ e2 }} health.

Upon activation, Dr. Mundo gains up to {{ e4 }} attack damage (no less than {{ e5 }}) for {{ e6 }} seconds based on his missing health.

Masochism grants {{ f2 }} attack damage above the minimum for every 1% of missing health ({{ f5 }}).

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ed.name: Searing Charge
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ed.description: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ed.tooltip:
Ornn charges, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

If Ornn rams into terrain, the resulting shockwave will deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f3 }}) physical damage and knock up enemies for {{ e6 }} second.

The shockwave destroys magma pillars and terrain created by enemy champions.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365f.name: Thunder Claws
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365f.description: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365f.tooltip:
Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage that chains to {{ e4 }} nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3452.name: Stand United
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3452.description: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3452.tooltip: Shen grants a shield to a target allied champion that lasts {{ e2 }} seconds and absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e8 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage based on their missing health. After channeling for {{ f1 }} seconds, Shen and his spirit blade teleport to the ally's location.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c4.name: Aegis of Zeonia
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c4.description: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32c4.tooltip: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and stunning them for {{ e2 }} second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3677.name: Void Rift
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3677.description: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3677.tooltip:
Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage.

Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac3.name: Arise!
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac3.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac3.tooltip:
Passive: Azir gains {{ e3 }}% attack speed. When Azir has {{ e6 }} or more Sand Soldiers, he gains {{ e7 }}% additional attack speed for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for {{ e1 }} seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks in his stead, stabbing the target for {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Other enemies caught in the soldier's attack take {{ f7 }}% of the stab's damage.

Azir stores up to {{ maxammo }} Sand Soldiers and prepares a new one every {{ f1 }} seconds.

Sand Soldiers that strike the same targets deal {{ e9 }}% damage after the first.
Sand Soldiers can attack targets outside of Azir's basic attack range.
Sand Soldiers expire twice as fast when near an enemy turret.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364a.name: Seismic Shove
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364a.description: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364a.tooltip:
Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364e.name: Harsh Lesson
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364e.description: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364e.tooltip:
Illaoi leaps at her target on her next basic attack, dealing bonus physical damage equal to {{ f1*100 }}% of their maximum health [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 attack damage].

When she strikes, nearby Tentacles will Slam at the target.

Harsh Lesson's bonus damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3290.name: Wind Wall
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3290.description: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3290.tooltip: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a5.name: Depth Charge
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a5.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a5.tooltip:
Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f341a.name: Petrifying Gaze
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341a.description: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f341a.tooltip: Cassiopeia deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by {{ e2 }}%.

5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab1.name: Lunge
5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab1.description: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab1.tooltip:
Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill.

If this ability hits an enemy, {{ e4 }}% of its cooldown is refunded.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae2.name: Void Spike
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae2.description: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Spike Racks</font>, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. <font color='#FFF673'>Isolated</font> targets are slowed for extra.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae2.tooltip:
Fires exploding spikes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit ({{ e5 }}% bonus damage to monsters). Heals Kha'Zix for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) if he is within the explosion radius.

Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for {{ e7 }}% instead.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d6.name: Hexplosive Minefield
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d6.description: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d6.tooltip:
Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies triggering a mine take {{ e5 }}% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad4.name: Stand Behind Me
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad4.description: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad4.tooltip:
Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.

On arrival, Braum and the ally gain {{ f3 }} Armor and {{ f4 }} Magic Resist ({{ e4 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3339.name: 90 Caliber Net
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3339.description: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3339.tooltip: Fires a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slows the first enemy hit by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} second.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3617.name: Frozen Tomb
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3617.description: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3617.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for {{ e4 }} seconds.

On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for {{ e5 }} seconds, healing for {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e7 }}% for each {{ e8 }}% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions.

Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for {{ e3 }} seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bc.name: Aria of Perseverance
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bc.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bc.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c4.name: Featherstorm
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c4.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c4.tooltip:
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.

Xayah can move while in the air.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac9.name: Hammer Shock
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac9.description: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac9.tooltip:
Poppy smashes the ground, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e5 }}% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.

The area slows enemies inside it by {{ e3 }}% and erupts after {{ e4 }} second, dealing the initial damage again.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5aba.name: Slice and Dice
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5aba.description: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5aba.tooltip:
Slice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through. Hitting an enemy grants the ability to use Dice for {{ e8 }} seconds.

Dice: Renekton dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies he passes through.

He generates {{ e4 }} Fury for each non-champion hit and {{ e5 }} Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of {{ e0 }} Fury.

Dice - 50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}). Enemies hit have {{ e2 }}% reduced Armor for {{ e9 }} seconds. No longer generates Fury.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d0.name: Essence Flux
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d0.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d0.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ad.name: Time Warp
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ad.description: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ad.tooltip: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ae.name: Nature's Grasp
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ae.description: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ae.tooltip: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for ({{ e2 }} to {{ e2 }}) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364b.name: Unraveled Earth
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364b.description: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364b.tooltip:
Places a field of dash-sensitive traps that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow enemies in the area by {{ f2 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the traps explode, dealing damage again.

Enemies dashing, being pushed, or being pulled through Unraveled Earth will trigger traps, taking {{ f3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage from each trap (maximum 4, each hit after the first deals {{ f4 }}% less damage).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3325.name: Zenith Blade
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3325.description: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3325.tooltip: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for {{ e2 }} seconds and Leona will dash to them.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3296.name: Intervention
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3296.description: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3296.tooltip: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35de.name: Electro Harpoon
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35de.description: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35de.tooltip:
Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of {{ e2 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3664.name: Bushwhack / Pounce
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3664.description: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3664.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee places an invisible trap that lasts for 2 minutes. The trap triggers when an enemy walks over it, revealing the victim and bleeding them for {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds.

{{ f4 }} traps may be active at once. (Maximum traps increases at level 6, 11 and 16)

Cougar: Nidalee lunges in target direction, dealing damage to nearby enemies.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365e.name: Majestic Roar
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365e.description: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365e.tooltip:
Volibear deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Minions and monsters are feared as well.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f336d.name: Shocking Orb
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336d.description: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336d.tooltip: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and is stunned for between {{ e8 }} and {{ e2 }} seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f334a.name: Chronobreak
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334a.description: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334a.tooltip: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}), increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ef.name: Magical Journey
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ef.description: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ef.tooltip:
Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling {{ e2 }}% faster than enemies.

The corridor disappears after {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c85.name: Permafrost
59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c85.description: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
59f4a1c58bf5501e050f4c85.tooltip:
Passive: Nearby melee allied champions' basic attacks apply Frost to enemy champions and large monsters.

Active: Target enemy with 4 stacks of Frost takes {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, is stunned for {{ e1 }} second(s), and is briefly displaced.

An enemy stunned by Sejuani cannot gain Frost for {{ f2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c2.name: Deadly Plumage
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c2.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c2.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aec.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aec.description:
Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aec.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.

Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for {{ e6 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f5.name: Triggerseed
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f5.description: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f5.tooltip:
Ivern shields an ally, absorbing up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. After 2 seconds, the shield bursts dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Can also be cast on Daisy.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cc.name: Thick Skin
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cc.description: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cc.tooltip:
Passive: {{ e3 }}% of the Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, {{ e2 }}% of gray health will turn back into health.

Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371c.name: Gravity Field
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371c.description:
Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned.

Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371c.tooltip:
Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemy units by {{ e1 }}% and adding a stack every {{ e4 }} seconds. At {{ e5 }} stacks the target is stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3713.name: Starsurge
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3713.description: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3713.tooltip:
First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed.

The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and a {{ e4 }} second stun.

Second Press: Detonate the core early.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366a.name: Demacian Justice
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366a.description:
The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion.

Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366a.tooltip:
Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional {{ e3 }}% of its maximum health as true damage.

Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333d.name: Pillar of Ice
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333d.description: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333d.tooltip: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for {{ e1 }} seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by {{ e2 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3433.name: Light Binding
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3433.description: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3433.tooltip: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ed.name: Cosmic Binding
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ed.description: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ed.tooltip:
Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} second(s).

If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3655.name: Trample
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3655.description: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3655.tooltip:
Alistar tramples the ground, ignoring unit collision and dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to nearby enemies. Each pulse that damages at least one enemy champion grants Alistar a Trample stack.

At {{ e5 }} Trample stacks Alistar empowers his next basic attack against an enemy champion to deal an additional {{ f3 }} magic damage and stun for {{ e6 }} second.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e4.name: Stacked Deck
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e4.description: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e4.tooltip:
Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by {{ e3 }}%.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f9.name: On The Hunt
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f9.description: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f9.tooltip:
Passive: Sivir gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.

Active: Sivir rallies her allies for {{ e3 }} seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to {{ e2 }}% after the first {{ e5 }} seconds of On The Hunt elapse.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae8.name: Rend
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae8.description: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae8.tooltip:
Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.

Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and its mana cost is refunded.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3651.name: H-28G Evolution Turret
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3651.description: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3651.tooltip:
Places a Turret. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Turrets shut down if Heimerdinger moves far away. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold {{ e3 }} Kits at once.

H-28G Evolution Turret Stats
Health: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f2 }})
Attack - Cannon: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.
Attack - Beam: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage every {{ e6 }} seconds.
Maximum Turrets Placed: 3

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fc.name: Bullet Time
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fc.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fc.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets for {{ e3 }} seconds, dealing (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per wave ({{ e2 }} waves total).

Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike for {{ f3 }}% damage.

Total Damage: {{ f2 }}

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367b.name: Yordle Snap Trap
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367b.description: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367b.tooltip:
Sets traps that an enemy Champion can spring, immobilizing them for {{ e6 }} seconds and granting True Sight for a short duration.

Traps last for {{ e3 }} seconds. {{ e5 }} traps may be active at once.

Trapped enemies take an additional {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) increased damage from Headshot.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3426.name: Sadism
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3426.description: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3426.tooltip: Dr. Mundo regenerates <scaleHealth>{{ f1 }}</scaleHealth> Health ({{ e1 }}% of max health) over {{ e2 }} seconds, and gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed for the duration.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d2.name: Dark Passage
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d2.description: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d2.tooltip:
Thresh throws the Lantern to a target location. If an ally clicks on it Thresh will pull both the Lantern and his ally to him.

The Lantern grants a shield lasting {{ e5 }} seconds that absorbs up to {{ e1 }} (+{{ f6 }}) damage to Thresh and up to one ally if they come near it. The shield amount scales with the number of souls Thresh has collected.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5aca.name: Heroic Charge
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5aca.description: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5aca.tooltip: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional physical damage and is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3611.name: Chum the Waters
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3611.description: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3611.tooltip:
Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first enemy champion it hits, slowing them, granting True Sight, and attracting a shark. After {{ e8 }} seconds, the shark erupts out of the ground, knocking its target up and knocking other enemies aside.

The farther the fish travels before attaching, the bigger the shark it attracts, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing by 40% to 80%.

Seastone Trident applies to the champion the fish attaches to and targets hit by the shark.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c0.name: Astral Infusion
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c0.description: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c0.tooltip:
Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to another champion ally.

If cast while affected by Rejuvenation, Soraka will grant her target its benefits for {{ f1 }} seconds.

Cannot be cast if Soraka is below 5% Health.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cb.name: Wild Cards
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cb.description: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33cb.tooltip: Throws three cards that deal {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369f.name: Valkyrie
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369f.description: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369f.tooltip:
Active: Corki flies a short distance, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to enemies in the fire left along his path.

Special Delivery: Corki flies a great distance, dropping bombs that knock aside enemies and leave a burning trail for 5 seconds. The trail slows enemies by {{ e2 }}% and burns them for {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368d.name: Dark Sphere
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368d.description: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368d.tooltip:
Conjures a Dark Sphere dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The sphere remains for {{ f1 }} seconds and can be manipulated by Syndra's other abilities.

This spell can be cast while moving.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af2.name: Glacial Storm
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af2.description: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af2.tooltip:
Activate: Drains {{ e2 }} Mana per second.

Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail that increases in size over {{ e7 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to targets and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}%.

When the Glacial Storm is fully formed, it slows targets' Movement Speed by {{ f1 }}% and does {{ e3 }}% damage instead.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3742.name: Meditate
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3742.description: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3742.tooltip:
Master Yi channels, restoring {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by {{ e4 }}% for every {{ e5 }}% of Master Yi's missing Health.

While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by {{ e3 }}%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets.

In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372e.name: Hate Spike
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372e.description: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372e.tooltip:
Evelynn's Lasher strikes in the target direction, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to the first unit hit and causing Evelynn's next 3 spells or attacks on that unit deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage. Then, Evelynn can recast this ability up to 3 times.

Recast: Fires spikes through the nearest enemy, dealing {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all units hit.

Refunds {{ e1 }}% of Hate Spike's cooldown if the Lasher hits a monster. Hate Spike prioritizes the target Evelynn is attacking.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3737.name: Lucent Singularity
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3737.description: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3737.tooltip:
Creates a zone that slows enemies by {{ e1 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds the zone detonates dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Activate again to detonate early.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3674.name: Frenzying Taunt
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3674.description: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3674.tooltip:
Taunt an enemy champion or monster for {{ e1 }} seconds and gain {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for the same duration.

While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3725.name: Ambush
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3725.description:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration.

When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3725.tooltip:
Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him.

Twitch gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e6 }} seconds after exiting Ambush. Ambush resets when a champion dies while affected by Deadly Venom.

Stealth - Camouflage: Twitch is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b8.name: Sear
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b8.description: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b8.tooltip:
Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a9.name: Void Ooze
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a9.description: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a9.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies in it by {{ e2 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f330a.name: Unbreakable Will
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330a.description: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330a.tooltip: Removes all disables from Alistar. For {{ e1 }} seconds Alistar takes {{ e2 }}% reduced physical and magical damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c7.name: Grand Challenge
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c7.description: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c7.tooltip:
Fiora reveals all four Vitals on target champion, for a potential {{ f8 }}% max health true damage. In addition, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's movement speed bonus ({{ f6 }}%) while near the target.

If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals in {{ e1 }} seconds or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed for {{ e7 }} (+{{ f9 }}) each second for between {{ e9 }} to {{ e6 }} seconds, scaling with the amount of Vitals hit.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3645.name: Massacre
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3645.description: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3645.tooltip:
Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemy champions, filling up 20% of the Blood Well for each hit.

Aatrox gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e5 }} attack range for {{ e8 }} seconds upon cast.

59f4a1c68bf5501e050f4c86.name: Defensive Ball Curl
59f4a1c68bf5501e050f4c86.description: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
59f4a1c68bf5501e050f4c86.tooltip:
Rammus enters a defensive formation for up to {{ e3 }} seconds, increasing Armor by {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% ({{ f1 }}) and Magic Resist by {{ e8 }} plus {{ e7 }}% ({{ f2 }}) but becoming slowed by {{ e5 }}%.

During this time, Spiked Shell deals {{ e4 }}% damage and also deals its damage to enemies that basic attack Rammus.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Defensive Ball Curl on cooldown.
Casting Defensive Ball Curl cancels Powerball and puts it on cooldown.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f0.name: Tempered Fate
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f0.description: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f0.tooltip:
Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3633.name: Summon: Tibbers
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3633.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3633.tooltip:
Summons Tibbers, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. For the next 45 seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) per second and attacks for {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) as magic damage. Annie can control Tibbers by reactivating this ability.

Tibbers Enrages when: summoned; Annie uses Pyromania on an enemy Champion; and when Annie dies.

Enrages: Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Movement Speed, decaying over 3 seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3720.name: Miasma
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3720.description: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3720.tooltip:
Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying {{ e2 }}% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second.

Miasma has a minimum cast range.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3608.name: Ruthless Predator
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3608.description: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3608.tooltip:
Renekton's next attack strikes twice, stunning his target for {{ e3 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage per hit ({{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total).

Each strike applies on-hit effects and generates Fury. Hitting a champion generates an additional {{ e7 }} Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Renekton attacks three times, stunning his target for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing a total of {{ e6 }} (+{{ f3 }}) damage. No longer generates Fury.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ab.name: Crippling Strike
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ab.description: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ab.tooltip:
Darius's next basic attack deals {{ f1 }} physical damage and slows the target by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e5 }} second.

Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and {{ e3 }}% of its cooldown if it kills the target.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3683.name: Heightened Senses
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3683.description: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3683.tooltip:
Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e1 }} seconds.

Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f375a.name: Drunken Rage
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f375a.description: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f375a.tooltip:
Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking {{ e1 }}% reduced damage for {{ e5 }} seconds.

After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e2 }}% of their max Health (max {{ e4 }} vs monsters).

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aef.name: Tactical Sweep
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aef.description: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aef.tooltip:
Camille winds up and then slices in a direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies hit.

Enemies hit by the outer half are slowed by {{ e4 }}%, decaying over {{ e2 }} seconds. They take extra physical damage equal to {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) of their maximum health, and Camille heals for {{ e9 }}% of the bonus damage dealt to champions.

Tactical Sweep does {{ e8 }}% less damage to non-epic monsters.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3243.name: Rapid Fire
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3243.description: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3243.tooltip: Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab5.name: Blade's Reach
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab5.description: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab5.tooltip:
Kayn deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies hit by {{ e3 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.
Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach.

Darkin: Gain a knock up.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3630.name: Move Quick
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3630.description: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3630.tooltip:
Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by {{ e1 }}% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.

Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for {{ e2 }} seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3604.name: Jack In The Box
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3604.description: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3604.tooltip:
Shaco creates a Jack in the Box that hides from view after {{ e5 }} seconds. It pops out when an enemy comes near or when uncovered by a ward or trinket, making nearby enemies flee very slowly for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Its attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. It lasts for {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) seconds while hidden or 5 seconds while firing.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d4.name: Blood Hunt
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d4.description: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d4.tooltip:
Passive: Warwick gains {{ e2 }}% attack speed against enemies below 50% health. He also senses low health champions globally, moving {{ e1 }}% faster toward them when out of combat. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% health.

Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion.

While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36dd.name: Leap
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36dd.description: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Wings</font>, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36dd.tooltip:
Leaps to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ae.name: Chronoshift
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ae.description: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ae.tooltip: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for {{ e2 }} seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, arriving with {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f8.name: Spell Shield
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f8.description: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f8.tooltip:
Sivir creates a magical barrier for {{ e1 }} seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains {{ e2 }} Mana.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f336c.name: Eye of Destruction
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336c.description: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f336c.tooltip: Xerath calls down a blast of arcane energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies within the target area, slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast take {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}%. This slow decays rapidly.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abf.name: Heartseeker Strike
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abf.description: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5abf.tooltip:
Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below {{ e3 }}% Health.

Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers {{ e4 }} swift strikes in front of him for a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage (deals {{ e2 }}% damage to minions and monsters).

Damage per Strike: {{ f1 }}

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad5.name: Phosphorus Bomb
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad5.description: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad5.tooltip: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for {{ e2 }} seconds (does not reveal stealth).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f338d.name: Cocoon / Rappel
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338d.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338d.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fa.name: Volley
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fa.description: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fa.tooltip:
Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.

Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3323.name: Shield of Daybreak
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3323.description: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3323.tooltip: Next basic attack deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and stuns for {{ e1 }} second.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3600.name: Sweeping Blade
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3600.description: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3600.tooltip:
Dashes through target enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) Magic Damage. Each cast increases your next dash's base Damage by 25%, up to {{ e6 }}%.

Cannot be re-cast on the same enemy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363a.name: Emperor's Divide
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363a.description: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363a.tooltip:
Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Azir and his allies can pass freely through Emperor's Divide.

Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab7.name: Stand Aside
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab7.description: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab7.tooltip: Draven throws his axes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.
