Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by {{ e3 }}%.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3283.name: Boomerang Blade
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3283.description: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3283.tooltip: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target hit and {{ e2 }}% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of {{ e3 }}%.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d5.name: Inner Flame
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d5.description:
Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit.

Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d5.tooltip:
Fires a blast of energy that explodes upon enemy contact, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Mantra Bonus - Soulflare: Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) additional magic damage and leaves a circle of flame that slows enemies by {{ f3 }}%. After 1.5 seconds the circle erupts, dealing {{ f2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3707.name: Glitterlance
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3707.description: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3707.tooltip:
Lulu and Pix each fire a piercing bolt dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to all additional enemies. Enemies hit are slowed by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e3 }} second(s).

An enemy can only be damaged for up to a total of {{ f6 }} damage per cast.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3682.name: Blinding Assault
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3682.description: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3682.tooltip:
Valor flies in a line, marking the first enemy he hits as Vulnerable and reducing its vision radius dramatically for {{ e3 }} seconds. He then deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

If the primary target is not a champion, it cannot attack for {{ e3 }} seconds.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ade.name: Violent Tendencies
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ade.description: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ade.tooltip:
Passive: When Kled basic attacks, he frenzies, gaining {{ e2 }}% attack speed for four attacks or {{ e6 }} seconds. Violent Tendencies then goes on cooldown.

The fourth hit deals bonus physical damage equal to {{ e4 }} plus {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) of the target's maximum health (maximum {{ e7 }} vs monsters).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3678.name: Tectonic Disruption
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3678.description: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3678.tooltip:
Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3601.name: Last Breath
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3601.description: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3601.tooltip:
Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.

For 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain {{ e5 }}% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.

5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab0.name: Hail of Arrows
5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab0.description: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
5a04afa48bf550a791fc5ab0.tooltip:
Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and desecrates the ground for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and reduces healing effects by {{ e4 }}%.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3349.name: Phase Dive
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3349.description: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3349.tooltip: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32db.name: Disintegrate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32db.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32db.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3266.name: Curtain Call
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3266.description: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3266.tooltip: Jhin sets up and channels, enabling him to fire 4 super shots at extreme range in a cone in front of him. The shots stop on the first champion hit, slowing it by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, increased by {{ e5 }}% for each 1% health the target is missing (up to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }})). The 4th shot crits for {{ f1 }}% damage.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368b.name: Starlight's Touch
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368b.description: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368b.tooltip:
Spends all charges to heal nearby allied champions for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of maximum Health) per charge, up to {{ e5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) at maximum charges.
Maximum charges: {{ e6 }}

Bravado-empowered attacks grant 1 charge of Starlight's Touch.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f342a.name: Command: Shockwave
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342a.description: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f342a.tooltip: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the Ball.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f344c.name: Crystallize
59f3aff28bf5501e050f344c.description: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f344c.tooltip: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice {{ e2 }} units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for {{ e1 }} seconds before it melts.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aee.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aee.description:
Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aee.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai bites a target dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage. At max Fury, the bite does 100% more and deals True Damage.

Maximum Damage: {{ f2 }}

Burrowed: Rek'Sai tunnels forward leaving two connected Tunnel Entrances. Clicking a Tunnel Entrance will make Rek'Sai dive to the other entrance.

Tunnel Entrances last for {{ e5 }} minutes and can be destroyed by enemies. Rek'Sai may have {{ e6 }} tunnels at one time. Tunnels have a {{ e8 }} second cooldown on use.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3692.name: Battle Dance
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3692.description: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3692.tooltip:
Flies to an allied champion, granting them a {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health shield for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Can be re-cast at no cost once within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32df.name: Mace of Spades
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32df.description: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32df.tooltip: Mordekaiser's next three hits are empowered. The first two strikes deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage. The final strike deals {{ e9 }} times the bonus damage of the previous strikes, up to {{ f5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3749.name: Ground Slam
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3749.description: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3749.tooltip:
Malphite slams the ground dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

This ability gains damage equal to {{ e3 }}% of Malphite's Armor.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36bf.name: Starcall
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36bf.description: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36bf.tooltip:
Calls down a star from Soraka to a target location. Enemies standing in the explosion radius take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

If Starcall hits a champion Soraka gains Rejuvenation for {{ e5 }} seconds, which restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) health per second and grants {{ e9 }}% movement speed when not moving toward enemy champions.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3741.name: Alpha Strike
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3741.description: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3741.tooltip:
Master Yi teleports to strike up to {{ e8 }} enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage, with an additional {{ e3 }} damage to minions and monsters. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable.

Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional {{ f1 }} physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by {{ e7 }} second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3421.name: Contaminate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3421.description: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3421.tooltip: Deals {{ e2 }} physical damage plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) per stack of Deadly Venom to all nearby enemies affected by Deadly Venom. (Max Stack Damage: {{ f2 }})

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3642.name: Dark Flight
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3642.description: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3642.tooltip:
Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for {{ e4 }} second.

Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ca.name: Tongue Lash
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ca.description: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ca.tooltip:
Damage the first enemy hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slow them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }}s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for {{ e6 }}s.

Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3696.name: Winter's Bite
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3696.description:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3696.tooltip:
Braum propels freezing ice from his shield dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [2.5% of Braum's Max Health] magic damage to the first enemy hit and slowing them by {{ e2 }}%, decaying over the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3719.name: Grasping Roots
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3719.description: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3719.tooltip:
Sends forward vines dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and rooting enemies for {{ e5 }} second(s).

Garden of Thorns: If Grasping Roots passes near a seed, a Vine Lasher grows dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. A Vine Lasher has 400 range and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c7.name: Transfusion
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c7.description: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c7.tooltip:
Vladimir drains the lifeforce of his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health. After casting Transfusion twice, Vladimir gains Crimson Rush the next time it becomes available to cast.

Crimson Rush: Vladimir is briefly hasted and for the next {{ e8 }} seconds Transfusion deals {{ e7 }}% increased damage and heals for an additional {{ f7 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f6 }}%) of his missing health (empowered heal has {{ e9 }}% effectiveness against minions).

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae7.name: Nimbus Strike
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae7.description: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae7.tooltip: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Wukong then gains {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b6.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b6.description: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b6.tooltip: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Physical Damage plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad3.name: Dazzle
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad3.description: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad3.tooltip: Readies a beam of starlight that, after {{ e3 }} second, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage and stuns enemies for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d6.name: Focused Resolve
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d6.description:
Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again.

Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d6.tooltip:
Links Karma to an enemy champion or monster, granting True Sight and dealing {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage. If the link is unbroken for {{ e3 }} seconds, the target is rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s) and takes an additional {{ effect1amount*0.5 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage.

Mantra Bonus - Renewal: Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health. If the link is not broken or the target dies, the root duration is increased by {{ f2 }} second(s) and Karma is healed for {{ f1 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) of her missing health.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365a.name: Relentless Pursuit
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365a.description: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365a.tooltip:
Quickly dashes a short distance.

Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by {{ e1 }} second (doubles to {{ e2 }} seconds against champions).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cf.name: Twin Bite
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cf.description:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cf.tooltip:
Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack, dealing {{ f2 }} and {{ f1 }} physical damage on the first and second hits respectively.

While Twin Bite is on cooldown, basic attacks reduce the remaining cooldown duration by {{ e3 }} seconds.

Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.

Twin Bite's second hit damage is equal to {{ e1 }}% of Shyvana's attack damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c9.name: Fling
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c9.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c9.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a4.name: Wall of Pain
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a4.description: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a4.tooltip: Creates a wall that lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by {{ e1 }}% and Movement Speed reduced by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362f.name: GNAR!
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362f.description: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them.  Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362f.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to {{ e4 }}% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to {{ e2 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage and slowing them by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take {{ e7 }}% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab9.name: Cull the Meek
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab9.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab9.tooltip:
Renekton swings his blade, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health for each non-champion hit and {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) Health for each champion hit, up to {{ e4 }} Health.

He generates 2.5 Fury for each non-champion hit and 10 Fury for each champion hit, up to a maximum of 30 Fury.

50 Fury Bonus: Damage increased to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}). Heal increased to {{ e7 }} (+{{ f4 }}) per non-champion and {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) per champion, up to {{ e9 }}. No longer generates Fury.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3652.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3652.description: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3652.tooltip:
Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage:

Champions and Monsters: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage, max {{ e6 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total damage
Minions: 60% of base damage

Rocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d1.name: Ice Blast
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d1.description: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33d1.tooltip: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% and Attack Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361c.name: Drain
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361c.description: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361c.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks creates a tether to the target unit and channels Drain on it, granting True Sight and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to the target. Fiddlesticks heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt.

Drain lasts up to {{ e4 }} seconds, dealing a total of {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

Drain returns cooldown equal to its remaining duration if the target dies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3400.name: Tormented Soil
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3400.description: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3400.tooltip: Curses an area for {{ e7 }} seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealt from {{ e5 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cb.name: Devour
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cb.description: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cb.tooltip:
Devour a target for {{ e1 }}s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of {{ e2 }} against neutral monsters).

Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%.

Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains {{ e4 }}% movement speed toward enemy champions.

Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to targets hit.

5a04afab8bf550a791fc5af3.name: Dragon Strike
5a04afab8bf550a791fc5af3.description: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
5a04afab8bf550a791fc5af3.tooltip:
Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3710.name: Pale Cascade
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3710.description: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3710.tooltip:
Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Lasts {{ e1 }} seconds.

Grants a temporary shield that absorbs {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d4.name: The Box
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d4.description: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d4.tooltip:
Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds, but break that wall.

Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cd.name: Abyssal Voyage
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cd.description: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35cd.tooltip:
Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.

'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ef.name: Rupture
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ef.description: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32ef.tooltip: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for {{ e5 }} second, take {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage, and are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3735.name: Void Rush
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3735.description: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3735.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next {{ e6 }} seconds.

Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing {{ e8 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage plus {{ e9 }}% of their missing Health.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374f.name: Shadow Dash
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374f.description: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374f.tooltip:
Passive: Dealing damage with Shadow Dash or Twilight Assault recovers {{ f1 }} Energy.

Active: Shen dashes in a direction, dealing {{ e2 }} [+{{ f2 }}] physical damage to enemy champions and neutral monsters in his path and taunting them for {{ e1 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363b.name: Electrical Surge
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363b.description: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363b.tooltip:
Passive: Every 5 attacks, Kennen deals bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target.

Active: Sends a surge of electricity through all nearby enemies affected by Mark of the Storm or Slicing Maelstrom, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bf.name: Rocket Jump
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bf.description: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35bf.tooltip:
Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Kills, Assists, and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on Champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3640.name: Vorpal Spikes
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3640.description: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3640.tooltip:
Cho'Gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f1 }}% of enemies' maximum Health as magic damage and slow by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, decaying over the duration.

Spikes grow wider as Cho'Gath gains Feast stacks.
Spikes deal an additional 0.5% of enemies' maximum Health per Feast stack.
Percent Health damage against minions and monsters is capped at {{ e8 }}.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e2.name: Ragnarok
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e2.description: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e2.tooltip:
Passive: Olaf gains {{ e1 }} Armor and {{ e1 }} Magic Resist.

Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next {{ e2 }} seconds. Olaf also receives a {{ e5 }}% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for {{ e4 }} second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains {{ e3 }} Attack Damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333c.name: Frozen Domain
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333c.description: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333c.tooltip: Trundle coats target location with ice for {{ e4 }} seconds, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed, {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed and {{ e3 }}% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fa.name: Double Up
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fa.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35fa.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a bouncing shot through an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to each target hit. Both apply on-hit effects.

The second shot can critically strike for {{ f1 }}% damage, and it always critically strikes if the first shot kills its target.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3666.name: Aspect Of The Cougar
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3666.description: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3666.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.

Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af1.name: Overload
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af1.description:
Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload.

On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5af1.tooltip:
Passive: Rune Prison and Spell Flux reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune for {{ e2 }} seconds, up to {{ e9 }} Runes.

Active: Unleash a runic blast, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy struck. Any active Runes are discharged.

If {{ e9 }} Runes are discharged, they Overload, shielding Ryze from {{ f3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) damage and increasing his Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f4.name: Brushmaker
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f4.description: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f4.tooltip:
Passive: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Ivern grows a patch of brush for {{ e1 }} seconds. For 3 seconds the area in and around the brush is revealed.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f323c.name: Empower
59f3aff18bf5501e050f323c.description: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f323c.tooltip: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365c.name: Rolling Thunder
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365c.description: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365c.tooltip:
Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining {{ e4 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e3 }} seconds. This bonus is enhanced to {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.

Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional {{ e1 }} physical damage and flings the target behind him.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3356.name: Cosmic Radiance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3356.description: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3356.tooltip: After a {{ e4 }} second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions, making them invulnerable for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cc.name: Bouncing Blade
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cc.description: Katarina throws a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cc.tooltip:
Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the target and {{ e4 }} nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.

The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3669.name: Judgment
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3669.description: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3669.tooltip:
Garen rapidly spins his sword around his body for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ f3 }} physical damage to nearby enemies -- {{ e1 }} plus {{ e3 }}% of his attack damage (+{{ f1 }}), {{ f2 }} times (increased by 1 every 3 champion levels) -- over the duration.

Enemy champions hit by {{ e6 }} spins lose {{ e5 }}% of their armor for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Judgment deals {{ e4 }}% increased damage when striking only one enemy.
Cancelling Judgment returns cooldown equal to the remaining duration.
Judgment can critically strike for bonus damage.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3708.name: Whimsy
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3708.description: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3708.tooltip:
On Ally Cast: Target ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }})% Movement Speed and {{ e7 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3726.name: Venom Cask
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3726.description: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3726.tooltip:
Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Enemies that remain within the cloud have {{ e2 }}% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f8.name: Cyclone
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f8.description: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f8.tooltip:
Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for {{ e4 }} second the first time they get hit.

At the start, Wukong gains {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional {{ e3 }}% per second over the duration.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae0.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae0.description: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae0.tooltip:
Kled charges toward a location, leaving a trail that grants allies increasing movement speed. While charging, Kled gains a shield that increases over time to a maximum of {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and lasts for 2 seconds after the charge ends.

Skaarl rams the first enemy champion encountered, dealing up to {{ f5 }}% (+{{ f1*3 }}%) of the target's maximum health as physical damage based on distance traveled.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360b.name: Spirit of Dread
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360b.description: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360b.tooltip:
Hecarim deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for {{ e1 }}% of the damage these enemies take from any source.

Hecarim cannot heal more than {{ e4 }} Health from minions or monsters.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad6.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad6.description:
Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies.

Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad6.tooltip: Leaps to an enemy dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5acb.name: Three Talon Strike
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5acb.description: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5acb.tooltip: Xin Zhao's next 3 basic attacks deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) extra physical damage and reduce his other cooldowns by 1 second. The final strike also knocks the target into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d5.name: Satchel Charge
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d5.description: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d5.tooltip:
Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after {{ e2 }} seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage.

Satchel Charge will hexplode structurally unsound towers below {{ f1*100 }}% of their Health.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374d.name: Twilight Assault
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374d.description: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374d.tooltip:
Shen recalls his spirit blade and draws it. Enemies it collides with are slowed by {{ e4 }}% when moving away from Shen for the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

Shen's next {{ e3 }} attacks deal {{ f1 }} plus {{ e2 }} (+{{ charabilitypower*.01 }})% of their target's max health as bonus magic damage. If the spirit blade collided with an enemy champion, those attacks deal {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }} (+{{ charabilitypower2*.01 }})% instead and have +{{ e9 }}% Attack Speed.

Each attack deals {{ e1 }}% increased damage to monsters (capped at {{ e7 }}).

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ba.name: Grandmaster's Might
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ba.description: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35ba.tooltip:
Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) additional Magic Damage.

Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him {{ f2 }} Armor and {{ f1 }} Magic Resist for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Armor bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e6 }}% bonus Attack Damage.
Magic Resist bonus is equal to {{ e3 }} + {{ e7 }}% Ability Power.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f6.name: Daisy!
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f6.description: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f6.tooltip:
Ivern summons his sentinel friend Daisy for {{ f6 }} seconds. If Daisy attacks the same champion three times in a row, she will create a shockwave knocking enemies up for 1 second (3s cooldown). Daisy has:
  • Health: {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }})
    Armor and Magic Resist: {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }})
    Attack Damage: {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }})

    • Recast to manually issue orders to Daisy.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aea.name: Duskbringer
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aea.description: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aea.tooltip:
Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for {{ e3 }} seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.

While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e4 }} Attack Damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b5.name: Flame Chompers!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b5.description: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b5.tooltip: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3379.name: Charm
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3379.description: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3379.tooltip: Blows a kiss dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a1.name: Missile Barrage
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a1.description: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a1.tooltip:
Active: Corki fires a missile that explodes at the first enemy it hits, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all nearby enemies.

Corki can store up to 7 missiles, and every 3rd missile will be a Big One, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acf.name: Shadow Slash
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acf.description: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy.  The shadow's spin slows.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acf.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows slash, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies.

Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by {{ e2 }}% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by {{ e3 }}% instead.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b4.name: Zap!
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b4.description: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32b4.tooltip: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by {{ e2 }}% for 2 seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f338a.name: Monsoon
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338a.description: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338a.tooltip: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to nearby allies each second for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374a.name: Flash Frost
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374a.description: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374a.tooltip:
A massive chunk of ice flies toward target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

At the end of its range or if Anivia activates the spell again, the missile detonates, doing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a small area and stunning units for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Enemies damaged by Flash Frost are also slowed by {{ f1 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ba.name: Infinite Duress
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ba.description: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33ba.tooltip: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for {{ e2 }} seconds. Deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab2.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab2.description:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.
Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab2.tooltip:
Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next {{ e7 }} seconds.

Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage plus {{ e3 }}% of their missing Health (Max: {{ e6 }} Damage vs. Monsters).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3686.name: Parallel Convergence
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3686.description: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3686.tooltip:
Passive: Ekko's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage to enemies under 30% health equal to {{ e3 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their missing health. Deals a minimum of {{ e6 }} damage, and a maximum of {{ e5 }} damage vs. minions and monsters.

Active: After a 3 second delay, Ekko creates a short-lived chronosphere at the target location that slows enemies who enter by {{ e0 }}%. If Ekko enters the sphere, he will detonate it, gaining a shield that absorbs up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage for 2 seconds. Enemies caught inside are stunned for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372d.name: Command: Protect
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372d.description: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372d.tooltip:
Passive: The Ball adds {{ e2 }} Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.

Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for {{ e5 }} seconds from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3662.name: Glacial Prison
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3662.description: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3662.tooltip:
Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for {{ e2 }} second.

The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage, stunning for {{ e6 }} seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by {{ e8 }}%. After {{ e3 }} seconds, the storm deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and slows by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3717.name: Deadly Spines
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3717.description: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3717.tooltip:
Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies within the area.

Garden of Thorns: If Deadly Spines is cast near a seed, a Thorn Spitter grows, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. A Thorn Spitter has 575 range and lasts {{ f2 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3718.name: Rampant Growth
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3718.description: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Additionally, Rampant Growth passively grants her plants improved maximum Health.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3718.tooltip:
Plants a seed, lasting {{ e6 }} seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Seeds spawned by Rampant Growth grant vision in a small area, and if stepped on they grant True Sight of the enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Zyra stores a seed every {{ ammorechargetime }} seconds (Max: 8 seeds planted).

Passive: Zyra's plants gain {{ e8 }}% extra maximum Health.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374e.name: Spirit's Refuge
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374e.description: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374e.tooltip:
Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for {{ e1 }} seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.

If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or {{ e2 }} seconds pass.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36aa.name: Decimate
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36aa.description: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36aa.tooltip:
After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take {{ e6 }}% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).

Darius heals for {{ e5 }}% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: {{ e7 }}%).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fb.name: Pierce
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fb.description: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fb.tooltip:
Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).

If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3653.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3653.description: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3653.tooltip:
Hurls a grenade that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Hitting a champion fully charges nearby turret beams.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363f.name: Blade of the Exile
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363f.description: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363f.tooltip:
Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for {{ e4 }} seconds, granting her {{ e5 }}% extra Attack Damage (+{{ f3 }}), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.

Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e7.name: Thundering Shuriken
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e7.description: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32e7.tooltip: Throws a shuriken that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371f.name: Noxious Blast
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371f.description: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371f.tooltip:
Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed decaying over {{ e4 }} seconds.

Noxious Poison deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3752.name: Cataclysm
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3752.description: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3752.tooltip:
Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Activate again to collapse the terrain.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f333e.name: Subjugate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333e.description: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f333e.tooltip: Trundle drains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and {{ e2 }}% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over {{ e3 }} seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned {{ e3 }} seconds after the drain ends.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3679.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3679.description: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3679.tooltip:
Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for {{ e2 }} seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.

Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) and slowing units hit by {{ e3 }}%.

Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3724.name: Fury of the Sands
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3724.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3724.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ e1 }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ e4 }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage ({{ e5 }} damage max per second), gains an additional {{ e8 }} Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a {{ e9 }}% reduced cooldown.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fe.name: Wild Growth
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fe.description: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33fe.tooltip: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For {{ e4 }} seconds, her ally gains {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by {{ e2 }}%.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ada.name: Double Daggers
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ada.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ada.tooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ e2 }}% damage.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ff.name: Steel Tempest
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ff.description: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ff.tooltip:
Thrusts forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.

Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.

If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bb.name: Bouncing Bomb
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bb.description: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33bb.tooltip: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad1.name: Mounting Dread
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad1.description: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ad1.tooltip:
Cripple an enemy, slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

After Lamb attacks the target twice, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ f2 }}% of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage.

Wolf's attack critically strikes targets for {{ e6 }}% increased damage if they are below {{ e5 }}% (+{{ f3 }}%) health (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

[Maximum {{ e0 }} vs. monsters]

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372f.name: Allure
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372f.description: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372f.tooltip:
Curses target champion or monster for 5 seconds. If Evelynn hits the target with a basic attack or ability, she will expunge the Curse, refund its mana cost, and briefly slow the target by {{ e3 }}%.

If the Curse lasts at least 2.5 seconds, expunging it Charms the target for {{ e2 }} second(s) and:
  • Against champions: shreds Magic Resist by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e0 }} seconds.
    Against monsters: deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Charm duration increased by {{ e1 }} seconds.

    • Casting Allure does not remove Evelynn from Demon Shade.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370d.name: Unspeakable Horror
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370d.description: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370d.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.

Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e3 }} seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371d.name: Death Ray
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371d.description:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path.

Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371d.tooltip:
Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to every enemy in its path.

Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3740.name: The Hextech Ultimatum
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3740.description: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3740.tooltip:
Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for {{ e3 }} seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }}% of their current health.

The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3744.name: Highlander
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3744.description: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3744.tooltip:
Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by {{ e5 }}%.

Active: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}%, Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}%, and grants immunity to slows for {{ e1 }} seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360f.name: Seastone Trident
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360f.description: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360f.tooltip:
Passive: Fizz's basic attacks bleed his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage over {{ e8 }} seconds.

Active: Fizz's next basic attack deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage. If the target has been bleeding for at least {{ e7 }} seconds, this bonus increases to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

If the Active kills a target it refunds {{ e2 }} mana and resets its cooldown to {{ e0 }} second.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f337a.name: Spirit Rush
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337a.description: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f337a.tooltip: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e9.name: Mourning Mist
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e9.description: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e9.tooltip:
Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals {{ e7 }}% of enemy's current Health as magic damage (minimum {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})), slows by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds, and marks champions and monsters for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Yorick and his minions are hasted by {{ e5 }}% while moving toward the mark.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3614.name: Twisted Advance
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3614.description: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3614.tooltip:
Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target.

Upon arrival, he deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and roots the target for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ec.name: Thrill of the Hunt
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ec.description: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, <font color='#cd90ee'>Camouflaging</font> him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ec.tooltip:
Rengar gains {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion (within {{ e3 }} range) for {{ e2 }} seconds.

After the first {{ e6 }} seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion results in a critical strike.

Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.
Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3619.name: Purge
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3619.description: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3619.tooltip:
For {{ e3 }} seconds, Urgot shoots at a nearby enemy {{ e8 }} times a second, dealing {{ e9 }} (+{{ f3 }}) physical damage per shot, locking onto champions recently damaged by his other abilities. He also shields himself, absorbing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage.

While firing, Urgot loses {{ e5 }} movement speed but has {{ e2 }}% slow resistance and can walk over minions and non-epic monsters.

Applies on-hits at 33% damage. Cannot critically strike. Minimum of {{ e0 }} damage to minions.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b9.name: Pillar of Flame
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b9.description: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b9.tooltip:
After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies.

Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3613.name: Living Artillery
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3613.description: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3613.tooltip:
Fires an artillery shot, damaging enemies above 40% health for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ effect1amount*1.5 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage based on their missing health.

If enemies are below 40% health, they take {{ f4 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f5 }}) magic damage instead.

Each subsequent shot within {{ e4 }} seconds costs {{ e3 }} more Mana (max {{ e5 }}).

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3626.name: Assassin's Path
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3626.description: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3626.tooltip:
Talon vaults up to {{ f2 }} units over the nearest structure or terrain in the target direction. The vault's speed is affected by Talon's movement speed.

Talon cannot dash over the same section of terrain more than once every {{ f3 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3659.name: Ardent Blaze
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3659.description: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3659.tooltip:
Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.

When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains {{ e2 }} Movement Speed for 1 second.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3702.name: Shadow Dance
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3702.description: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges periodically, max 3 stacks.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3702.tooltip:
Akali quickly strikes through her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every {{ f1 }} seconds up to {{ e4 }} total.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e6.name: Consume
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e6.description: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36e6.tooltip:
Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a minion or monster, dealing {{ e1 }} true damage and healing himself for {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}).

Passive - Feed The Yeti: For every Large or Epic Monster Consumed, Nunu gains increased Size, {{ e0 }}% Maximum Health, and {{ e9 }} out of combat Movement Speed for the next {{ f5 }} seconds (max {{ e6 }} stacks).

Recently Consumed monsters will not grant additional bonuses ({{ e5 }} second cooldown).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371b.name: Siphon Power
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371b.description:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack.

Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371b.tooltip:
Viktor blasts an enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage while granting Viktor a shield that absorbs up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) damage over the next {{ e2 }} seconds.

Viktor's next basic attack deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage.

Augment - Turbocharge: Viktor gains {{ e3 }}% Movement Speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab8.name: Two-Shiv Poison
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab8.description: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab8.tooltip:
Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's movement speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Active: Shaco throws a shiv that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and reduces the target's movement speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. The shiv's damage is increased by up to {{ e3 }}% based on the target's missing health.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3668.name: Courage
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3668.description: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3668.tooltip:
Passive: Killing units permanently grants {{ f2 }} armor and magic resist, up to a maximum of {{ e2 }}. Current Bonus: {{ f1 }}

Active: Garen steels his courage for {{ e4 }} seconds. For the first {{ e7 }} seconds, he takes {{ e6 }}% less damage and gains {{ e5 }}% Tenacity. For the remaining duration, he takes {{ e3 }}% less damage.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b3.name: Spider Form
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b3.description: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b3.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for {{ e3 }} movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3727.name: Spray and Pray
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3727.description: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3727.tooltip:
For {{ e2 }} seconds Twitch gains {{ e5 }} Attack Range and {{ e1 }} Bonus Attack Damage.

For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal {{ e3 }}% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of {{ e4 }}% damage.

Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b0.name: Preparation
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b0.description: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a <font color='#FFF673'>Dagger</font> into the air directly above herself.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33b0.tooltip: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air and gains {{ e4 }}% decaying movement speed over {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a8.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a8.description:
Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds.

Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a8.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e5 }} Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.

Active: Creates an electric aura dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e2 }} seconds to nearby enemies.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32ab.name: Bramble Smash
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32ab.description: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32ab.tooltip: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are slowed briefly.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aeb.name: Whiplash
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aeb.description: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aeb.tooltip:
Whip target with Lashers, applying on hit effects and dealing magic damage equal to {{ f1 }} plus {{ e5 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of their max health. Then, gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Entering Demon Shade resets Whiplash's cooldown and empowers it. When empowered, Whiplash pulls Evelynn to her target, dealing magic damage to them and enemies in the way equal to {{ f2 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a2 }}%) of their max health.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a4.name: Riptide
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a4.description: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a4.tooltip:
Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. This slow diminishes over time.

A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take {{ e3 }}% less damage from additional explosions.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3751.name: Demacian Standard
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3751.description: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3751.tooltip:
Passive: Gains {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for {{ e4 }} seconds and grants surrounding allied champions {{ e3 }}% Attack Speed.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3654.name: UPGRADE!!!
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3654.description: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3654.tooltip:
Makes Heimerdinger's next ability free and gives it bonus effects. Reactivate to cancel.

H-28Q Apex Turret: Places a Turret for 8 seconds that deals {{ e7 }} (+{{ a2 }}) Magic Damage with its cannon and {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage with its beam. It has splash damage, immunity to disables, its attacks slow by 25% for 2 seconds and it doesn't count toward the Turret limit.

Hextech Rocket Swarm: Fires 4 waves of rockets that each deal {{ e8 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Magic Damage. Champions and Monsters hit by multiple rockets take reduced damage, max {{ e5 }} (+{{ f2 }}).

CH-3X Lightning Grenade: Throws a bouncing grenade that discharges three times, dealing {{ e0 }} (+{{ f4 }}) Magic Damage. Both the stun and slow areas are larger and the slow is improved to 80%.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c4.name: Chain of Corruption
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c4.description: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c4.tooltip:
Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for {{ e2 }} seconds.

The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain {{ e4 }} Blight stacks over the duration.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3689.name: Decrepify
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3689.description: Swain sends Beatrice to cripple enemies within the target area. Crippled targets are slowed and damaged over time.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3689.tooltip:
Beatrice lands on the target area for {{ e3 }} seconds and attacks the closest enemy unit prioritizing champions, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second and slowing it down by {{ e2 }}%. Damage is doubled to {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage against minions.

Beatrice will look for a new target if the current one moves away or dies. If any nearby enemy unit is afflicted by Torment then it will become Beatrice's target.

Max damage: {{ f2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) to non-minions and {{ f4 }} (+{{ f5 }}) to enemy minions.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3641.name: Feast
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3641.description: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3641.tooltip:
Ravenously feed on an enemy, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) true damage to champions or {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) to minions and monsters. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath gains a stack of Feast, which causes him to grow in size and gain {{ e3 }} maximum health.
