Only {{ e4 }} total stacks can be gained from minions and non-epic monsters. (Current: {{ f3 }}/{{ e4 }})

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ac.name: Apprehend
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ac.description: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ac.tooltip:
Passive: Darius gains {{ e1 }}% Armor Penetration.

Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a3.name: Titan's Wrath
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a3.description: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36a3.tooltip:
Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for {{ e3 }} seconds, shielding him from the next {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) ({{ e2 }}% of his max Health) damage.

While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all enemies around his target.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c8.name: Mega Adhesive
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c8.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c8.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e3.name: Crushing Blow
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e3.description: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33e3.tooltip: Wukong's next attack gains {{ e4 }} range, deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f332d.name: Power Fist
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332d.description: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f332d.tooltip: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e2.name: Bear Stance
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e2.description: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35e2.tooltip:
Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for {{ e3 }} second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Activation: Increases Movement Speed by {{ e1 }}% and ignores unit collision for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361e.name: Crowstorm
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361e.description: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f361e.tooltip:
Fiddlesticks channels for {{ e3 }} seconds, then blinks to the target point unleashing a murder of crows that flock wildly around him, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage per second to all enemy units in the area.

The effect lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing up to {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) total magic damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d3.name: Flay
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d3.description: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d3.tooltip:
Passive: Thresh's basic attacks deal from {{ f3 }} to {{ f3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) additional magic damage, which builds up while not attacking (total souls collected plus up to {{ e3 }}% total Attack Damage).

Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage in a line beginning behind Thresh. Enemies hit are pushed in the direction of the swing, then slowed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} second.

Cast forward to push; cast backward to pull.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3758.name: Let's Bounce!
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3758.description: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3758.tooltip:
First cast: Zac squishes himself down, making him immune to Crowd Control for up to {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies standing on top of him are slowed by {{ e4 }}%.

Second cast: Charging for at least {{ f1 }} seconds before recasting causes Zac to scoop up enemies on top of him, carrying them towards a location. Upon landing nearby enemies take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are briefly slowed.

Reactivating before Zac charges up knocks back nearby enemies instead.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3704.name: Excessive Force
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3704.description: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3704.tooltip:
Causes next basic attack to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.

Vi charges a new punch every {{ f1 }} seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367c.name: Ace in the Hole
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367c.description: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f367c.tooltip:
Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to {{ e2 }} range. The shot deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.

Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac4.name: Shifting Sands
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac4.description: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac4.tooltip:
Azir shields himself for {{ e6 }} seconds, blocking up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3759.name: Barrel Roll
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3759.description: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3759.tooltip:
Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after {{ e4 }} seconds, the cask will explode, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to {{ e6 }}% after {{ e5 }} seconds. Deals {{ e7 }}% damage to minions.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab6.name: Spinning Axe
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab6.description: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab6.tooltip:
Draven's next attack will deal {{ f1 }} bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to {{ e5 }} plus {{ e2 }}% of his bonus Attack Damage.

This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.

Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae4.name: Savagery
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae4.description:
Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction.

Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae4.tooltip:
Slash all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line for {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage per strike.

Ferocity effect:
Each hit deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage.

If cast outside max range, Rengar lunges forward to extend the range of the piercing attack.
If used during leap, Savagery is cast immediately following the leap.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363d.name: Slicing Maelstrom
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363d.description: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f363d.tooltip:
Summons a magical storm for {{ e3 }} seconds that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every {{ e2 }} seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3.

Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional {{ e4 }}% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369d.name: Arcanopulse
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369d.description: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369d.tooltip:
First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.

Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f9.name: Ranger's Focus
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f9.description: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f9.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks grant Focus for {{ e1 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e2 }} times. Stacks fall off one at a time, and at {{ e2 }} stacks, Ranger's Focus can be cast, consuming all Focus.

Active: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Ashe gains {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed, and her basic attacks fire a flurry of arrows dealing {{ f1 }} physical damage. During this time, she does not stack Focus. Ranger's Focus applies Frost Shot.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3252.name: Insanity Potion
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3252.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3252.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5abc.name: Devastating Charge
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5abc.description: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5abc.tooltip:
Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for {{ e5 }} seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).

Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fc.name: Sentinel
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fc.description:
Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target.

Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36fc.tooltip:
Passive: When Kalista is near her Oathsworn, she gains +{{ f1 }}% Attack Speed. If they both basic attack the same target, she deals {{ e2 }}% of their max health as magic damage. {{ e7 }} second cooldown per target.

Active: Send a soul Sentinel to patrol an unseen area. Champions spotted are revealed for 4 seconds. Sentinels last 3 laps.

Kalista gains a charge of Sentinel every {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f4.name: Nether Blade
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f4.description: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35f4.tooltip:
Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage and restore {{ e1 }}% of his missing Mana (increases to {{ e4 }}% against champions).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3690.name: Unleashed Power
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3690.description: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3690.tooltip:
Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created.

Damage per sphere: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}).
Minimum total damage: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}).

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d0.name: Mimic
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d0.description: LeBlanc creates a clone and casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells. The clone casts a fake copy of that spell. LeBlanc can instead send the clone far away, where it casts a fake copy of her most recently cast spell.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d0.tooltip:
LeBlanc copies one of her spells and creates a Mimic decoy to cast it with her. The Mimic lasts {{ e7 }} seconds.

  • Shatter Orb deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.
    Distortion deals {{ e5 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.
    Ethereal Chains deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each time.
    Using this spell on itself invokes Shadow of the Rose.

    • Shadow of the Rose
    The Mimic appears at target location and approaches the closest visible enemy Champion, then casts a fake version of LeBlanc's most recent basic ability.

    Has a separate {{ f2 }} second cooldown. This Mimic lasts much longer but cannot be controlled.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3756.name: Unstable Matter
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3756.description: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3756.tooltip:
Zac's body erupts, dealing {{ e1 }} magic damage +{{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of the enemy's max health as magic damage to nearby enemies.

Absorbing Goo reduces Unstable Matter's cooldown by {{ e4 }} second.

Max health damage is capped at {{ e5 }} versus minions and monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f338b.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338b.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f338b.tooltip: Deals magic damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus {{ e6 }}% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: {{ e2 }}.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e7.name: Dragon's Rage
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e7.description: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35e7.tooltip:
Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the initial target's bonus health.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3672.name: Powerball
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3672.description: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3672.tooltip:
Rammus accelerates in a ball, gaining up to {{ f2 }}% Movement Speed over {{ e4 }} seconds. On enemy collision, he stops, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies, knocking them back, and slowing them by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} second.

Can be reactivated to end the effect early and put Powerball on cooldown.
Powerball is a channeled spell and is subject to interruption by spells that prevent casting.
Casting Powerball cancels Defensive Ball Curl and puts it on cooldown.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d1.name: Flame Breath
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d1.description:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d1.tooltip:
Shyvana unleashes a fireball that stops after hitting a champion. All enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ f4 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are marked for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Shyvana's basic attacks against marked targets deal {{ e4 }}% of their maximum health as magic damage on hit.

Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f5 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage and scorching the earth for 4 seconds. Enemies on scorched earth take {{ f3 }} (+{{ f6 }}) (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage per second.

Flame Breath's on-hit damage against monsters is capped at {{ e3 }} damage per hit.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d0.name: Burnout
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d0.description:
Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d0.tooltip:
Shyvana deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage per second to nearby enemies and gains a bonus {{ e2 }}% movement speed that decays over {{ e7 }} seconds.

While Burnout is active, basic attacks deal {{ effect1amount*0.25 }} (+{{ charbonusphysical*0.25 }}) (+{{ charabilitypower2*.25 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and extend its duration by {{ e8 }} second.

Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.

Burnout has a maximum duration of {{ e9 }} seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3616.name: Glacial Path
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3616.description: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3616.tooltip:
Casts an ice claw that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3257.name: Shatter Orb
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3257.description: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal reduced damage to minions).
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3257.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal {{ e7 }}% damage to minions).

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae5.name: Bola Strike
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae5.description:
Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration.

Ferocity effect: roots the target.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae5.tooltip:
Throw a bola, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Ferocity effect:
Deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and roots the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cc.name: Remove Scurvy
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cc.description: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32cc.tooltip: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) + {{ e2 }}% of his missing Health.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374b.name: Frostbite
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374b.description: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f374b.tooltip:
Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

If a target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, they take double damage.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3612.name: Caustic Spittle
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3612.description: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3612.tooltip:
Passive: Kog'Maw gains {{ e2 }}% bonus attack speed.

Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f1.name: Bladesurge
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f1.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f1.tooltip:
Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying on-hit effects.

If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown is refreshed and Irelia gains {{ e2 }} Mana.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3712.name: Lunar Rush
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3712.description: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3712.tooltip:
Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d2.name: Dragon's Descent
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d2.description:
Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36d2.tooltip:
Active: Shyvana transforms into a dragon, gaining {{ e0 }} Health and flying to target location. Enemies along her path take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked toward her target location.

Passive: Shyvana generates {{ e3 }} Fury every second. Basic Attacks generate {{ e2 }} Fury.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ff.name: Mark of the Assassin
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ff.description: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36ff.tooltip:
Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and mark the target for {{ e4 }} seconds.

Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage and restore {{ e3 }} energy.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b7.name: Final Hour
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b7.description: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b7.tooltip:
Vayne gains {{ e1 }} bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for {{ e2 }} seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by {{ e5 }} seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within {{ e6 }} seconds.

Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains {{ e4 }} movement speed.
Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for {{ e3 }} second when she Tumbles.

Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3274.name: Dark Procession
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3274.description: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3274.tooltip: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with {{ e5 }} Health around target area for {{ e1 }} seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371a.name: Stranglethorns
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371a.description: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f371a.tooltip:
Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for {{ e1 }} second.

Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, attacking in a flurry for 200% total damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3447.name: Seismic Shard
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3447.description: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3447.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and steals {{ e2 }}% Movement Speed from the target for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3663.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3663.description: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies.  As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3663.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) total damage.

Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3743.name: Wuju Style
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3743.description: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3743.tooltip:
Passive: Grants {{ e1 }}% ({{ f1 }}) Attack Damage.

Active: Basic attacks deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ f2 }}) bonus true damage for {{ e5 }} seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ee.name: Call of the Forge God
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ee.description: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ee.tooltip:
Ornn summons a massive lava elemental which stampedes toward him. Enemies run over by the elemental take {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage, are slowed by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds and become Brittle for {{ f10 }} seconds.

Ornn can recast this ability to smash into the elemental to redirect and empower it. The empowered elemental knocks up enemies for 1.5 seconds, deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ f4 }}) magic damage and applies Brittle.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32dc.name: Incinerate
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32dc.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32dc.tooltip: Casts a cone of fire dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemies in the area.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3716.name: Voice of Light
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3716.description: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3716.tooltip:
Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adf.name: Jousting
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adf.description: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5adf.tooltip:
Kled dashes, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.

If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within {{ e6 }} seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c6.name: Riposte
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c6.description: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35c6.tooltip:
Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next {{ e2 }} seconds and then stabs in the target direction.

The stab deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds.

If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3706.name: Tantrum
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3706.description: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3706.tooltip:
Passive: Amumu takes {{ e1 }} reduced damage from physical attacks.

Active: Amumu tantrums, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to surrounding units.

Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce the cooldown of Tantrum by 0.5 seconds.

5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aed.name: Burrow / Un-burrow
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aed.description:
Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks.

While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
5a04afaa8bf550a791fc5aed.tooltip:
Un-Burrowed: Burrow into the ground.

Burrowed: Un-burrow, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Physical Damage and knocking up the closest enemy for {{ e5 }} second. All other nearby enemies will be knocked back. An enemy who has been knocked up will be immune from further Un-burrow effects for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Burrowed Effects: New abilities, +{{ f1 }} Movement Speed, reduced vision range, disabled basic attacks, and gains Tremor Sense: Nearby enemies that move in Fog of War have their position revealed to Rek'Sai and her allies.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3670.name: Overdrive
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3670.description: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3670.tooltip:
Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining {{ e1 }}% Movement Speed and {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.

When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds.

59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c81.name: Shield of Durand
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c81.description: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt nearby enemies.
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c81.tooltip:
Passive: After not taking damage for {{ e6 }} seconds Galio gains a shield that absorbs {{ f3 }} magic damage.

First Cast: Galio starts to charge, gaining {{ e1 }} (+{{ f2 }})(+{{ f4 }})% Damage Reduction from Magic Damage and {{ f5 }}% of that amount as Damage Reduction from Physical Damage. While charging, Galio slows himself by {{ e3 }}%.

Second Cast: Galio taunts nearby enemy champions for {{ e4 }} to {{ e7 }} seconds and refreshes the Damage Reduction for {{ e8 }} seconds. Taunt duration and radius increase with charge time.

Shield of Durand's charge cannot be interrupted by crowd control.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3694.name: Crystal Slash
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3694.description: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3694.tooltip:
Skarner deals {{ f1 }} physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for {{ e2 }} seconds.

While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals {{ f1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus magic damage.

Basic attacks against non-structures lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3693.name: The Quickness
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3693.description: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3693.tooltip:
Gain {{ e5 }}% movement speed for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Touching enemies deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and charms them for {{ e3 }} second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan {{ e6 }}% decaying movement speed.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3369.name: Event Horizon
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3369.description: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3369.tooltip: After a {{ e2 }} second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for {{ e1 }} seconds.

5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae9.name: Vault Breaker
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae9.description: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
5a04afa98bf550a791fc5ae9.tooltip:
Charges a powerful punch that carries Vi forward.

First Cast: Slows Movement Speed by {{ e4 }}% while increasing damage and dash range over 1.25 seconds.

Second Cast: Dashes forward dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) to {{ f2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and applying Denting Blows to all enemies hit (deals {{ e3 }}% damage to minions and monsters). Stops upon colliding with an enemy champion, knocking it back.

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ace.name: Razor Shuriken
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ace.description: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5ace.tooltip:
Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to each additional enemy.

Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 25% less damage than previous shurikens.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3705.name: Assault and Battery
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3705.description: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3705.tooltip:
Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and has True Sight of the target. Any enemies in the way are knocked aside and dealt 75% of the damage.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ea.name: Eulogy of the Isles
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ea.description: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35ea.tooltip:
Yorick summons The Maiden of the Mist and {{ e1 }} Mist Walkers. The Maiden has {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) Health, deals {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) magic damage, and raises Mist Walkers from nearby enemy deaths.

When Yorick damages the Maiden's target he will deal {{ e5 }}% of their max Health as bonus magic damage ({{ e7 }} second cooldown).

If the Maiden is summoned inside a lane, she will start pushing the lane.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365b.name: The Culling
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365b.description: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f365b.tooltip:
Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for {{ e1 }} seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. The Culling does {{ e8 }}% damage to minions.

Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.

Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3700.name: Twilight Shroud
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3700.description: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes Invisible and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3700.tooltip:
Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location that lasts for {{ e2 }} seconds and slows enemies within its area by {{ e3 }}%.

While inside the shroud Akali gains Invisibility and {{ e6 }}% movement speed. Attacking or using abilities briefly removes Invisibility.

Stealth - Invisible: Akali can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369a.name: Baleful Strike
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369a.description: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369a.tooltip:
Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first two enemies hit.

Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large monsters grant two.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3676.name: Plasma Fission
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3676.description: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3676.tooltip:
Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage and applies a slow of {{ e5 }}% that decays over {{ e4 }} second(s).

Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.

Killing a unit with this refunds {{ e2 }}% of the Mana Cost.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f328c.name: Blood Rush
59f3aff18bf5501e050f328c.description: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac7.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac7.description: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac7.tooltip:
Toggle Off: Blood Thirst: Every third attack, Aatrox restores {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1*100 }}% Missing Health) Health.

Toggle On: Blood Price: Every third attack, Aatrox deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus physical damage and fills up 20% of the Blood Well.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362e.name: Hop / Crunch
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362e.description:
Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further.

Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362e.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Leaps to a location, gaining {{ e2 }}% Attack Speed for 3 seconds. If Gnar lands on a unit he will bounce off it, traveling further. Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage and slows briefly if the unit landed on was an enemy.

Mega Gnar: Leaps to a location and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) [6% of Gnar's Max Health] physical damage to nearby enemies on landing. Enemies Gnar lands directly on top of are slowed briefly.

If Crunch is used to transform, Gnar will still be able to bounce.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35df.name: The Equalizer
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35df.description: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35df.tooltip:
Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for {{ e5 }} seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by {{ e3 }}% and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage each second.

You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3699.name: Glacial Fissure
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3699.description: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3699.tooltip:
Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing enemies above it by {{ e4 }}%.

Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for {{ e5 }} seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f324d.name: Bladework
59f3aff18bf5501e050f324d.description: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f324d.tooltip: Fiora gains {{ e4 }}% attack speed for her next two attacks. The first attack cannot critically strike, but will apply a {{ e3 }}% slow for {{ e2 }} second. The second attack is guaranteed to critically strike for {{ f4 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ca.name: Hemoplague
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ca.description: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ca.tooltip:
Vladimir infects enemies in a target area with a virulent plague, causing them to take {{ e2 }}% increased damage from all sources for {{ e4 }} seconds.

After {{ e4 }} seconds, Vladimir deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all infected targets. If Hemoplague damages an enemy Champion, Vladimir heals himself for {{ f4 }} (+{{ f3 }}), plus {{ e5 }}% for each Champion beyond the first.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3631.name: Noxious Trap
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3631.description: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3631.tooltip:
Tosses a stored mushroom as a trap that detonates if an enemy steps on it, spreading poison to nearby enemies that slows Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, reveals them and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over {{ e9 }} seconds.

Traps last {{ e5 }} minutes and take {{ e4 }} second to arm and stealth. If a thrown trap lands on another trap, it will bounce up to {{ e6 }} Teemos further before planting.

Teemo forages for a mushroom every {{ f1 }} seconds, but he is only big enough to carry 3 at once.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3606.name: Hallucinate
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3606.description: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets).  Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3606.tooltip:
Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes.

  • Mini boxes deal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage, make enemies flee for {{ e7 }} second(s), and trigger together.

    Clone deals {{ e8 }}% of Shaco's damage and receives {{ e2 }}% increased damage.

    • The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33de.name: Transcendent Blades
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33de.description: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33de.tooltip: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for {{ e3 }}% of the damage dealt against champions. ({{ e4 }}% vs. minions and monsters)

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3632.name: Molten Shield
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3632.description: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3632.tooltip:
Annie grants herself and Tibbers {{ e1 }}% damage reduction for {{ e3 }} seconds.

While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a6.name: Requiem
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a6.description: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33a6.tooltip: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3401.name: Black Shield
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3401.description: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3401.tooltip: Shields an allied Champion for {{ e2 }} seconds. The shield absorbs {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3347.name: Timewinder
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3347.description: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3347.tooltip: Ekko throws a device that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by {{ e2 }}%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3634.name: Harvesters of Sorrow
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3634.description: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3634.tooltip:
Passive: Mordekaiser gains bonus experience for killing minions near allied champions.

Bonus Experience Earned: {{ f3 }}

Active: Target an ally, linking them to Mordekaiser:

  • Both gain up to {{ e5 }} movement speed toward one another.

    When they touch, they deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 4 seconds to nearby enemies.

    Reactivate to both instantly steal {{ e6 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health from nearby enemies ({{ e7 }}% heal on minions, max {{ e8 }} units; deals magic damage).

59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c82.name: Justice Punch
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c82.description: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
59f4a1c48bf5501e050f4c82.tooltip: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for {{ e2 }} seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f334b.name: Aqua Prison
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334b.description: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f334b.tooltip: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ae.name: Bloodlust
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ae.description: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ae.tooltip:
Passive: Tryndamere thirsts for blood, gaining {{ e1 }} Attack Damage plus {{ e2 }} per 1% Health missing.

Active: Tryndamere consumes his Fury, restoring {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health, plus {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Health per Fury consumed.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad7.name: Spinning Slash
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad7.description: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad7.tooltip:
Tryndamere spins through his enemies, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to enemies in his path and generating Fury.

Spinning Slash's cooldown is reduced by {{ e2 }} second whenever Tryndamere critically strikes. This reduction is increased to {{ e3 }} seconds against champions.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f335c.name: Grand Entrance
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335c.description: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f335c.tooltip: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and knocking up enemies for {{ e3 }} second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cb.name: Time Bomb
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cb.description: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36cb.tooltip:
Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After {{ e2 }} seconds it detonates, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to all surrounding enemies.

Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d7.name: Blinding Dart
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d7.description: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d7.tooltip: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and blinds the target for {{ e2 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3386.name: Undying Rage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3386.description: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3386.tooltip: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for {{ e3 }} seconds, refusing to be reduced below {{ e2 }} Health and instantly gaining {{ e1 }} Fury.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368c.name: Bastion
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368c.description:
Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion.

Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f368c.tooltip:
Taric's spells will also cast from a nearby ally protected by Bastion.

Passive: Bastion increases Armor by {{ f1 }} ({{ e1 }}% of Taric's Armor).

Active: Blesses an ally with Bastion and shields them for {{ e2 }}% of their maximum Health for {{ e3 }} seconds. Bastion lasts on the target until a new one is chosen.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3462.name: Explosive Cask
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3462.description: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3462.tooltip: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3729.name: Burning Agony
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3729.description: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3729.tooltip:
Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by {{ e5 }}%.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3293.name: Reckoning
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3293.description: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3293.tooltip: Blasts an enemy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366b.name: Solar Flare
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366b.description: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f366b.tooltip:
Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and slowing enemies by {{ e1 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.

Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence, causing her next {{ e5 }} basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal {{ e3 }} (+{{ a2 }}) bonus magic damage on hit.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3691.name: Gleaming Quill
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3691.description: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3691.tooltip:
Flings a magical feather that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the first enemy hit.

If the feather hits a champion or epic monster, Rakan restores {{ f1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) health to himself and nearby allies after {{ e4 }} seconds or when he touches an ally.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36de.name: Void Assault
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36de.description: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes <font color='#91d7ee'>Invisible</font>, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to <font color='#00DD33'>Evolve Adaptive Cloaking</font>, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36de.tooltip:
Passive: Ranking up Void Assault allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities.

Active: Kha'Zix becomes Invisible for {{ e1 }} seconds and activates Unseen Threat. While Invisible, he gains {{ e3 }}% movement speed and ignores unit collision. Void Assault can be cast a second time within {{ e2 }} seconds.

Evolved Adaptive Cloaking: While out of combat, Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault for {{ e5 }} seconds in brush. This persists for up to {{ f1 }} seconds after exiting the brush ({{ f1 }} second per brush cooldown).

Stealth - Invisible: Kha'Zix can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f7.name: Bandage Toss
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f7.description: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f7.tooltip: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} second.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3665.name: Primal Surge / Swipe
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3665.description: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3665.tooltip:
Human: Nidalee heals target ally champion for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) to {{ e2 }} (+{{ f3 }}) based on their missing health and grants them {{ e4 }}% Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

Cougar: Nidalee claws at enemies in target direction.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3615.name: Sapling Toss
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3615.description: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3615.tooltip:
Maokai flings a sapling, which stands watch for {{ f1 }} seconds. Saplings will chase nearby enemies, detonating on proximity, dealing {{ e1 }} +{{ e8 }}% [+{{ a1 }}%] Target Max Health magic damage and slowing enemies struck by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds.

Saplings placed in brush last for {{ f2 }} seconds and cause a larger explosion, dealing double damage over {{ e6 }} seconds to all enemies hit.

Maximum {{ e4 }} Damage to non-Champions, doubled for brush.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372b.name: Command: Attack
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372b.description: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f372b.tooltip:
Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum {{ e3 }}%).

Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370c.name: Shroud of Darkness
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370c.description: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370c.tooltip:
Passive: Nocturne gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.

If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362c.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362c.description:
Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced.

Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f362c.tooltip:
Mini Gnar: Throws a boomerang that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and slows enemies by {{ e3 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds. The boomerang returns towards Gnar after hitting an enemy, dealing {{ e7 }}% damage to subsequent targets. Each enemy can only be hit once. Catching the boomerang reduces its cooldown by {{ f1 }}%.

Mega Gnar: Throws a boulder that stops when it hits an enemy, slowing all nearby enemies and dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage. Picking up the boulder reduces its cooldown by {{ e6 }}%.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35eb.name: Volcanic Rupture
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35eb.description: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f35eb.tooltip:
Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage and slows by {{ e5 }}% for {{ e6 }} seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for {{ e3 }} seconds.

The fissure stops shortly after hitting an enemy champion.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ba.name: Conflagration
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ba.description: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36ba.tooltip:
Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3457.name: Call of the Void
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3457.description: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3457.tooltip: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAP> magic damage and silencing enemies hit for {{ e2 }} second(s).

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d1.name: Death Sentence
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d1.description: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35d1.tooltip:
Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for {{ e2 }} seconds.

Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.

Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by {{ e4 }} seconds if it hits an enemy.

5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab4.name: Reaping Slash
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab4.description: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
5a04afa58bf550a791fc5ab4.tooltip:
Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.
Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.

Deals {{ e6 }} bonus physical damage to monsters.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d2.name: Trueshot Barrage
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d2.description: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
59f3aff28bf5501e050f32d2.tooltip: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum {{ e3 }}%).

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3675.name: Tremors
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3675.description: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f3675.tooltip:
Shake the earth for {{ e2 }} seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e3 }} seconds, stacking up to {{ e6 }} times.

Tremors deals {{ e5 }}% damage to turrets.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370e.name: Paranoia
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370e.description: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f370e.tooltip:
Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.

While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3629.name: Powder Keg
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3629.description: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3629.tooltip:
Places a powder keg that can be attacked by Gangplank or his enemies at a location for {{ e5 }} seconds.

If Gangplank destroys a keg, it explodes dealing the attack's damage as physical damage (ignores {{ e0 }}% Armor) to enemies and slowing them by {{ e4 }}% for {{ e2 }} seconds. Champions take {{ e3 }} bonus physical damage from the explosion.

When a keg explodes, other kegs with overlapping blast zones chain explode (damage does not stack).

Kegs health decays every {{ f5 }} seconds. (Decay rate increases at level 7 and 13)

Keg explosions apply Parrrley's plunder effect.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3618.name: Switcheroo!
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3618.description: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3618.tooltip:
Jinx swaps weapons.

Fishbones, the Rocket Launcher: Basic attacks deal 110% Damage to the target and nearby enemies, gain {{ e3 }} range, drain Mana, and scale {{ e5 }}% less with bonus Attack Speed.

Pow-Pow, the Minigun: Basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed for 2.5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 3 times for a total bonus of {{ f4 }}% (bonus scales with spell rank and Jinx's level). Stacks fall off one at a time and only benefit Jinx's first attack after switching to Rocket Launcher.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360d.name: Onslaught of Shadows
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360d.description: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f360d.tooltip:
Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to enemies hit.

Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for {{ e2 }} to {{ e3 }} seconds (increases by charge distance).

Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3384.name: Mocking Shout
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3384.description: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3384.tooltip: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by {{ e1 }} for {{ e3 }} seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by {{ e2 }}% for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f8.name: Despair
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f8.description: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curses</font> refreshed.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f33f8.tooltip: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to {{ e2 }} plus {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }})% of their maximum health each second.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364f.name: Test of Spirit
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364f.description: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a <font color='#669900'>Vessel</font> and begin spawning Tentacles.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f364f.tooltip:
Illaoi pulls the spirit from an enemy champion for {{ e3 }} seconds (reduced when Illaoi is attacked by the target). The spirit can be attacked, with {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f5 }}%) of the damage taken echoing to its owner.

If the spirit dies or the target leaves its range, the target becomes a Vessel for {{ e2 }} seconds and is slowed by {{ e8 }}% for {{ e5 }} seconds. Vessels spawn Tentacles every {{ f1 }} seconds if no other Tentacles are nearby.

Tentacles will automatically Slam at spirits and Vessels once every 10 seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a8.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a8.description: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
59f3aff18bf5501e050f32a8.tooltip: For {{ e3 }} seconds, Kog'Maw's basic attacks gain {{ e1 }} range and deal {{ e2 }}% (+{{ f1 }})% of the target's maximum health as bonus magic damage.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f330d.name: Audacious Charge
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330d.description: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f330d.tooltip: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by {{ e2 }}% for 0.5 seconds. Charging grants Xin Zhao {{ e3 }}% attack speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c6.name: Defile
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c6.description: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c6.tooltip:
Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores {{ e2 }} Mana.

Toggle On: Drains {{ cost }} Mana to deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.

5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acd.name: Eclipse
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acd.description: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
5a04afa78bf550a791fc5acd.tooltip: Grants {{ e4 }} (+{{ f1 }}) bonus Armor and {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for {{ e3 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b1.name: Zephyr
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b1.description: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36b1.tooltip:
Passive: While Zephyr is not on cooldown, Janna gains {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f1 }}%) Movement Speed and can move through units.

Active: Deals {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f3 }}) magic damage to an enemy and slows their Movement Speed by {{ e3 }}% (+{{ f2 }}%) for {{ e4 }} seconds.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad8.name: Condemn
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad8.description: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad8.tooltip:
Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to {{ f1 }} and the target is stunned for {{ e3 }} seconds.

Condemn's damage is increased by {{ e2 }}% if the target collides with terrain.

59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35da.name: Deadly Flourish
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35da.description: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
59f3b02a8bf5501e050f35da.tooltip:
Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to it, and {{ e4 }}% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way.

If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's basic attacks, Lotus Traps, or allies within the last 4 seconds it will root them for {{ e2 }} seconds and grants Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f3444.name: Rune Prison
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3444.description: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f3444.tooltip: Instantly root an enemy for {{ e1 }} second and deal {{ e2 }} (+{{ a1 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) magic damage.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c5.name: Lay Waste
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c5.description: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f36c5.tooltip:
Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each nearby enemy.

If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f7.name: Decoy
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f7.description: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f36f7.tooltip:
Wukong becomes Invisible for {{ e2 }} seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage to enemies near it after {{ e2 }} seconds.

Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.

5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad9.name: End of the Line
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad9.description: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
5a04afa88bf550a791fc5ad9.tooltip:
Fires a powder round that deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage to enemies in a line.

After 2 seconds or {{ e6 }} seconds on collision with terrain, the round detonates, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage to all nearby enemies.

59f3aff28bf5501e050f339e.name: Wish
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339e.description: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
59f3aff28bf5501e050f339e.tooltip: Calls upon divine powers to restore {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health to all allied Champions. Wish's power is increased by 50% on each Champion below 40% Health.

5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac0.name: Noxian Diplomacy
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac0.description: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
5a04afa68bf550a791fc5ac0.tooltip:
Talon leaps to target and deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage. If cast from melee range, Talon does not leap but instead critically strikes, dealing {{ f2 }}% damage ({{ f3 }}).

When Noxian Diplomacy kills a unit, Talon regains {{ f4 }} health and refunds {{ e5 }}% of its cooldown.

59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3656.name: Wind Becomes Lightning
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3656.description: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
59f3b02b8bf5501e050f3656.tooltip:
Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.

Slash: {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) damage.
Thrust: {{ e2 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and slows by {{ e6 }}% for {{ e7 }} seconds.

Cast time is reduced with Attack Speed provided from items and levels (minimum of 0.4 seconds). Current cast time: {{ f5 }}

Deals 50% less damage to minions.
Lifesteal is 33% effective on both attacks.
Extends the current duration of Xin Zhao's other abilities by {{ f5 }} seconds.

59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369b.name: Dark Matter
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369b.description: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
59f3b02c8bf5501e050f369b.tooltip:
After 1.2 seconds, dark matter falls from the sky to the target location, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Every 50 stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown by 10% (currently {{ f2.0*100 }}%).

59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3715.name: Comet of Legend
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3715.description: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
59f3b02d8bf5501e050f3715.tooltip:
Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to {{ e2 }}%.

Active: Fly for {{ e3 }} units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.

Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3232.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3232.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3238.name: Teleport
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3238.description: After channeling for 4.5 seconds, teleports your champion to target allied structure, minion, or ward.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3228.name: Disabled Summoner Spells
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3228.description: Summoner spells are disabled in this mode.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3235.name: Ghost
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3235.description: Your champion gains increased Movement Speed and can move through units for 10 seconds. Grants a maximum of 28-45% (depending on champion level) Movement Speed after accelerating for 2 seconds.

5a04ae1b8bf550a791fc5a65.name: Smite
5a04ae1b8bf550a791fc5a65.description: Deals 390-1000 true damage (depending on champion level) to target epic, large, or medium monster or enemy minion. Restores Health based on your maximum life when used against monsters.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322f.name: Poro Toss
59f3aff18bf5501e050f322f.description: Toss a Poro at your enemies. If it hits, you can quickly travel to your target as a follow up.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3231.name: Nexus Siege: Siege Weapon Slot
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3231.description: In Nexus Siege, Summoner Spells are replaced with Siege Weapon Slots. Spend Crystal Shards to buy single-use Siege Weapons from the item shop, then use your Summoner Spell keys to activate them!

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3225.name: Barrier
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3225.description: Shields your champion from 115-455 damage (depending on champion level) for 2 seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322c.name: Mark
59f3aff18bf5501e050f322c.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322e.name: Clarity
59f3aff18bf5501e050f322e.description: Restores 50% of your champion's maximum Mana. Also restores allies for 25% of their maximum Mana.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3227.name: Cleanse
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3227.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and lowers the duration of incoming disables by 65% for 3 seconds.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322b.name: Flash
59f3aff18bf5501e050f322b.description: Teleports your champion a short distance toward your cursor's location.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322d.name: Heal
59f3aff18bf5501e050f322d.description: Restores 90-345 Health (depending on champion level) and grants 30% Movement Speed for 1 second to you and target allied champion. This healing is halved for units recently affected by Summoner Heal.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3226.name: To the King!
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3226.description: Quickly travel to the Poro King's side.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3234.name: Ignite
59f3aff18bf5501e050f3234.description: Ignites target enemy champion, dealing 70-410 true damage (depending on champion level) over 5 seconds, grants you vision of the target, and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

59f3aff18bf5501e050f322a.name: Disabled Summoner Spells

59f3aff18bf5501e050f3233.name: Exhaust
