59f3af988bf5501e050f2ca5.name: Mark of the Crippling Candy Cane

59f3af988bf5501e050f2c62.name: Glyph of Scaling Magic Resist
59f3af988bf5501e050f2c62.description: +0.13 magic resist per level (+2.34 at champion level 18)

59f3af988bf5501e050f2c8d.name: Seal of Scaling Armor
59f3af988bf5501e050f2c8d.description: +0.13 armor per level (+2.34 at champion level 18)

59f3af988bf5501e050f2cd6.name: Greater Seal of Scaling Magic Resist
59f3af988bf5501e050f2cd6.description: +0.1 magic resist per level (+1.8 at champion level 18)

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c5.name: Voracity
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c5.description:
Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds.

If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37aa.name: Harrier
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37aa.description: Valor periodically marks enemies as <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font>. Quinn's first basic attack against <font color='#FFF673'>Vulnerable</font> targets will deal bonus physical damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376e.name: An Acquired Taste
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376e.description: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d2.name: Stone Skin
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d2.description: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a3.name: Contempt for the Weak
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a3.description: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a0.name: Prowl
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a0.description:
Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range.

Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e1.name: Deadly Venom
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e1.description: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3777.name: Living Forge
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3777.description:
Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere.

Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase.

Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376f.name: Sigil of Malice
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376f.description:
When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage.

Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d6.name: Blast Shield
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d6.description: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377c.name: League of Draven
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377c.description: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ac.name: Surging Tides
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ac.description: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37de.name: Glorious Evolution
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37de.description: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378f.name: Guerrilla Warfare
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378f.description: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3792.name: Shurima's Legacy
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3792.description: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3788.name: Dread
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3788.description:
Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer.

Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ab.name: Z-Drive Resonance
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ab.description: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3776.name: Shepherd of Souls
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3776.description: <mainText>Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.</mainText>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379e.name: Chosen of the Storm
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379e.description: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3782.name: Nimble Fighter
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3782.description: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3783.name: Icathian Surprise
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3783.description: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ae.name: Bravado
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ae.description: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e5.name: Fury of the Xer'Sai
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e5.description: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b8.name: Hextech Capacitor
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b8.description: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e6.name: Illumination
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e6.description: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b4.name: Mana Surge
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b4.description: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3795.name: Carnivore
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3795.description: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3775.name: Flurry
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3775.description: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c6.name: Fury of the Dragonborn
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c6.description: <mainText>Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.</mainText>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a4.name: Mana Barrier
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a4.description: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a6.name: Organic Deconstruction
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a6.description: Vel'Koz's abilities apply <font color='#FFFFFF'>Organic Deconstruction</font> to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3770.name: Damnation
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3770.description: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37da.name: Umbra Blades
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37da.description:
Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself.

Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ea.name: Arcane Mastery
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ea.description: <mainText>Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.</mainText>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c9.name: Skaarl, the Cowardly Lizard
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c9.description:
Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts.

While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3797.name: Iron Ambassador
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3797.description:
Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage.

The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a8.name: King's Tribute
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a8.description: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

59f3b0398bf5501e050f380b.name: Tailwind
59f3b0398bf5501e050f380b.description:
Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her.

Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b5.name: Hextech Munitions
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b5.description: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379d.name: Lightslinger
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379d.description: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c7.name: Eternal Hunger
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c7.description: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e7.name: Glory in Death
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e7.description:
After being killed, Sion will reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, gain 100% Lifesteal and deal bonus damage equal to 10% of his target's maximum Health (max 75 to monsters).

All his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants a burst of Movement Speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3799.name: Prophet of an Elder God
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3799.description: Illaoi and the <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font> she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, <font color='#669900'>Vessels</font>, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c0.name: Salvation
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c0.description: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3773.name: Junkyard Titan
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3773.description: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3771.name: Gathering Fire
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3771.description: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37af.name: Transcendent
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37af.description:
Spells gain extra effects at max rank.

Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds.
Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage.
Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%.
Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d3.name: Frost Shot
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d3.description:
Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets.

Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376c.name: Duelist's Dance
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376c.description: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3785.name: Iceborn
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3785.description: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c1.name: Clean Cuts
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c1.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a9.name: Mark of the Kindred
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a9.description: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bc.name: Spider Queen
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bc.description:
Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.

Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b7.name: Essence Theft
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b7.description: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378b.name: Blade's End
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378b.description: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c8.name: Short Fuse
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c8.description: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ca.name: Unseen Threat
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ca.description: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3789.name: Colossal Smash
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3789.description: <mainText>Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.</mainText>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3798.name: Rock Surfing
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3798.description: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a7.name: Headshot
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a7.description: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379f.name: Fury of the North
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379f.description: <mainText>After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage.  Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.</mainText>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ec.name: Rebirth
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ec.description: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b9.name: Hemorrhage
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b9.description: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ed.name: Ki Barrier
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ed.description: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377d.name: Way of the Wanderer
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377d.description: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37dc.name: Center of the Universe
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37dc.description: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379c.name: Determination
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379c.description: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a5.name: Spiked Shell
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a5.description: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ba.name: Battle Fury
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ba.description: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a2.name: Sunlight
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a2.description: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d4.name: Martial Poise
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d4.description: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3781.name: Warpath
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3781.description: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e9.name: Double Strike
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e9.description: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a1.name: Perseverance
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37a1.description: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b2.name: Concussive Blows
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b2.description: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3790.name: Pyromania
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3790.description: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377f.name: Backstab
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377f.description: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376a.name: Draw a Bead
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376a.description: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3787.name: Echoing Flames
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3787.description: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

5a04afc48bf550a791fc5af5.name: Blaze
5a04afc48bf550a791fc5af5.description: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378e.name: Rage Gene
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378e.description: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37df.name: Serpentine Grace
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37df.description: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377a.name: Fleet of Foot
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377a.description: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377b.name: Love Tap
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377b.description: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3796.name: Blood Well
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3796.description: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox becomes Hellbent for as long as he stays in combat with champions or monsters, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cd.name: Visionary
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cd.description: After 5 attacks, Nunu's next spell costs no Mana and is empowered to do its next rank's effects.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3793.name: Mark of the Storm
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3793.description:
Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy.

The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d0.name: Ionian Fervor
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d0.description: Irelia reduces the duration of disables on herself based on whether she is Outnumbered by nearby champions. If she's in an even fight, she'll reduce disables by a small amount, if she's outnumbered, she'll reduce disables by a larger amount.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3780.name: Reign of Anger
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3780.description: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b1.name: Crystal Spires
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b1.description: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3769.name: Power Chord
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3769.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ee.name: Martial Cadence
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ee.description: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d8.name: Pix, Faerie Companion
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d8.description: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3784.name: Sap Magic
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3784.description: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3779.name: Void Stone
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3779.description: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b3.name: Phenomenal Evil Power
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b3.description: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d7.name: Cursed Touch
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d7.description: Amumu's basic attacks <font color='#9b0f5f'>Curse</font> enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.<rules>

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d9.name: Soul Siphon
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d9.description: Morgana has Spell Vamp, healing herself whenever she deals damage with her spells.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3768.name: Relentless Assault
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3768.description: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cc.name: Loaded Dice
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cc.description: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e2.name: Adrenaline Rush
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e2.description: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376d.name: Noxious Slipstream
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376d.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f376b.name: Living Vengeance
59f3b0318bf5501e050f376b.description: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d5.name: Twin Disciplines
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37d5.description: Akali's first two attacks are empowered. The first strike heals her, and the second strike deals bonus magic damage. Twin Disciplines will recharge itself automatically a short while after being used.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ad.name: Carrion Renewal
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ad.description: Swain regenerates Mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3786.name: Get Excited!
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3786.description: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378a.name: Aegis Protection
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378a.description: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3794.name: Runic Blade
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3794.description: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

59f3b0398bf5501e050f380c.name: Demon Shade
59f3b0398bf5501e050f380c.description: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3772.name: Whisper
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3772.description: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e3.name: Clockwork Windup
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e3.description: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c3.name: Crimson Pact
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c3.description: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b6.name: Staggering Blow
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37b6.description: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378c.name: Trial by Fire
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378c.description: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c2.name: Death Defied
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c2.description: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bf.name: New Destiny
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bf.description: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c4.name: Time in a Bottle
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37c4.description:
Zilean stores time as Experience.

When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cf.name: Traveler's Call
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cf.description: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cb.name: Berserker Rage
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37cb.description: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37db.name: Moonsilver Blade
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37db.description: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379b.name: Triumphant Roar
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379b.description: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3791.name: Iron Man
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3791.description: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ef.name: Void Shift
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ef.description:
When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage.

Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f378d.name: Rising Spell Force
59f3b0318bf5501e050f378d.description: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f1.name: Happy Hour
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f1.description: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37eb.name: Granite Shield
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37eb.description: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ce.name: Unseen Predator
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37ce.description:
While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack.

Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat.

Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bd.name: Night Hunter
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37bd.description: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3774.name: Monkey's Agility
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3774.description: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37dd.name: Garden of Thorns
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37dd.description:
Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 45 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies.

Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f377e.name: Holy Fervor
59f3b0318bf5501e050f377e.description: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e0.name: Soul Eater
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e0.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f0.name: Cell Division
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37f0.description: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e8.name: Adaptive Defenses
59f3b0318bf5501e050f37e8.description:
Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for 1.5-2.5 seconds.

This effect has a 20-10 second cooldown.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f379a.name: Hextech Affinity
59f3b0318bf5501e050f379a.description: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

59f3b0318bf5501e050f3778.name: The Darkin Scythe
59f3b0318bf5501e050f3778.description: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

59f4a1e08bf5501e050f4c89.name: Friend of the Forest
59f4a1e08bf5501e050f4c89.description: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a18.name: Peering Farsight Ward
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a18.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Reveals an area and places a visible fragile ward up to 2000 units away. This ward is untargetable by allies.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a21.name: Commencing Stopwatch
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a21.description:
Transforms into a Stopwatch after 6 minutes. That Stopwatch contributes 300 gold for the items it builds into.

(Stopwatch normally contributes 600 gold)

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a0e.name: Edge of Night
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a0e.description:
+250 Health
+55 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Lethality
UNIQUE Active - Night's Veil: Channel for 1.5 second to grant a spell shield that blocks the next enemy ability. Lasts for 7 seconds (40 second cooldown).

(Can move while channeling, but taking damage breaks the channel.)

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6a.name: Infernal Mask
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6a.description:
+550 Health
+300 Mana
+90 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Eternity: 15% of damage taken from champions is gained as Mana. Spending Mana restores 20% of the cost as Health, up to 25 per spell cast.
UNIQUE Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage.

59f49f268bf5501e050f4c68.name: Ardent Censer
59f49f268bf5501e050f4c68.description:
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+50% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +10% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive: +8% Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Whenever you heal or shield an ally, you and your ally gain 10% - 30% Attack Speed and your attacks deal an additional 5 - 20 on-hit magic damage for 6 seconds.

This does not include regeneration effects. Bonus effects are based on target's level.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a75.name: Rapid Firecannon
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a75.description:
+30% Attack Speed
+30% Critical Strike Chance
+5% Movement Speed

Passive: Moving and attacking will make an attack Energized.

UNIQUE Passive - Firecannon: Your Energized attacks gain 35% bonus Range (+150 range maximum) and deal 50~120 bonus magic damage (based on level) on hit.

Attacks become Energized 25% faster. Energized attacks function on structures.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f6.name: Targon's Brace
5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f6.description:
+175 Health
+50% Base Health Regen
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 200 (+10 per level) Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 40 Health (+2% missing health) and grants them kill Gold.

These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 3 charges.
UNIQUE Passive: Gain Bandit.
QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Shield Battery, a permanent shield that regenerates slowly outside of combat.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f49f268bf5501e050f4c64.name: Manamune
59f49f268bf5501e050f4c64.description:
+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants bonus Attack Damage equal to 2% of maximum Mana. Refunds 15% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +5 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each basic attack, spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 3 times every 12 seconds).

Transforms into Muramana at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a8c.name: Super Spicy Snax
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a8c.description: Active - Feed The King: The King breathes fire for 4 seconds, dealing 705-1479 true damage over the duration to enemies caught in the cone. Deals up to 560 true damage to Turrets. (120s cooldown)

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a00.name: Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a00.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Restores 15% of missing Health and Mana over 15 seconds.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a20.name: Talisman of Ascension
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a20.description:
+45 Armor
+175% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

UNIQUE Passive - Point Runner: Builds up to +20% Movement Speed over 2 seconds while near turrets, fallen turrets and Void Gates.
UNIQUE Passive - Favor: Enemy minions killed by your allies sometimes drop coins that give either 40 gold or 6% missing mana (minimum 10). Cannon minions always drop coins.
UNIQUE Active: Grants nearby allies +40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive: Gain Bandit.
QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

''Praise the sun.'' - Historian Shurelya, 22 September, 25 CLE

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59fd.name: Boots of Speed
5a04acf28bf550a791fc59fd.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a94.name: Dark Matter Scythe
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a94.description:
Passive - Dark Matter Scythe: Flay's on-hit passive charges damage very quickly. Flay will throw enemies much farther (based on their Missing Health).

''If you want to make a Singularity from scratch, you must first destroy the universe.''

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0a.name: Infinity Edge
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0a.description:
+70 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strike bonus damage is increased by 50%.

59f3af948bf5501e050f2bf2.description:
+450 Health

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking at least 400 to 1800 damage (based on level) within 5 seconds, gain a shield for 75% of your bonus Health. After 0.75 seconds, the shield decays over 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

Sterak's Fury: When Lifeline triggers, grow in size and strength, gaining +30% Tenacity for 8 seconds.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a5b.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a5b.description:

+30% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive - Shiv Lightning: Your Energized attacks deal 60~160 bonus magic damage (based on level) to up to 5 targets on hit (deals +65% bonus damage to minions and can critically strike).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ab5.name: Doran's Shield
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ab5.description:
+80 Health

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6b.name: Tower: Beam of Ruination
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6b.description:
Attach, then recast to fire a damaging beam from a turret to your cursor.

First Cast: Attach a Slayer Beam to the target turret that can be fired 3 times.

Next Three Casts: Fires the attached beam towards your cursor, dealing 30/level + 30% of the hit target's maximum health (20% damage to minions) in magic damage to all targets in a line.



Beam will last 15 seconds, or until it has been fired 3 times.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0e.name: Enchantment: Runic Echoes
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0e.description:
+60 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 15% of your missing Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b2e.name: Enchantment: Bloodrazor
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b2e.description:
+50% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 4% of the target's maximum Health in bonus physical damage (max 75 vs. monsters and minions) on hit.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b3a.name: Sanguine Blade

+10% Life Steal

Pulling or pushing an enemy into the Dark Star will destroy them instantly, scoring points for your team (+5, or +1 for Abyss Scuttlers).

Winning a round requires 100 points, and the final points must be from a champion kill.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a5d.name: Zeal
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a5d.description:
+15% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Strike Chance

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59ed.description:
+500 Health
+200% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+2 Gold per 10 seconds

Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health (+2% missing health) and grants them kill Gold. These effects require a nearby ally. Recharges every 20 seconds. Max 4 charges.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 4 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.
UNIQUE Passive: Gain Bandit.
QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Shield Battery, a permanent shield that regenerates slowly outside of combat.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a19.name: Skirmisher's Sabre
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a19.description:

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks vs. monsters deal @Effect2Amount@ bonus damage and grant you @Effect12Amount@% bonus Attack Speed for @Effect11Amount@ seconds. Damaging a monster with a spell or attack steals @Effect1Amount@ Health over @Effect4Amount@ seconds and burns them for @Effect13Amount@ magic damage. Killing monsters grants special bonus experience.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59ee.name: Eye of the Oasis

QUEST: Earn 750 gold using this item.
REWARD: Favor is upgraded to Emperor's Favor and allied champions moving toward you gain 8% movement speed.

Limited to 1 Gold Income Item.

59f49f268bf5501e050f4c62.name: Manamune (Quick Charge)

+25 Attack Damage
+250 Mana

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b3f.description:
+30 Attack Damage
+30% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive - Trap Detection: Nearby stealthed enemy traps are revealed.
UNIQUE Active - Hunter's Sight: A stealth-detecting mist grants vision in the target area for 5 seconds, revealing enemy champions that enter for 3 seconds (60 second cooldown).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b39.name: Banner of Command
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b39.description:
+60 Armor
+30 Magic Resist
+125% Base Health Regen
+10% Cooldown Reduction

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6e.name: Zeke's Convergence
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6e.description:
+60 Armor
+30 Magic Resist
+250 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Active - Conduit: Bind to an ally without an existing Conduit.
UNIQUE Passive: Casting your ultimate near your ally surrounds you with a frost storm and ignites your ally's basic attacks for 10 seconds. Enemies inside your frost storm are slowed by 20% and your ally's attacks burn their target for 50% bonus magic damage over 2 seconds (45 second cooldown).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2aab.description:

''It is at this magical precipice where a champion is dismantled, reforged, and empowered.''

UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 30%.

+80 Ability Power

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1a.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1a.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks vs. monsters deal @Effect2Amount@ bonus damage and grant you @Effect12Amount@% bonus Attack Speed for @Effect11Amount@ seconds. 59f3af948bf5501e050f2bf3.name: Jaurim's Fist
59f3af948bf5501e050f2bf3.description:
+15 Attack Damage
+200 Health

+350 Health
+300 Mana
+55 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Aura: Nearby enemy champions take 10% more magic damage.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a89.description:
UNIQUE Passive - Mementos of the Hunt: Rengar collects trophies when killing Champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he has. Kills and assists grant 1 trophy.

3 Trophies: Rengar gains 25 Movement Speed whilst out of combat or in brush.
6 Trophies: Increases the range of Rengar's Leap by 125.
12 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's duration is increased by 5 seconds.
20 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's Movement Speed while stealthed is doubled.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2abb.name: Elixir of Wrath
59f3af888bf5501e050f2abb.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +30 Attack Damage and Bloodlust for 3 minutes.

Bloodlust: Dealing physical damage to champions heals for 15% of the damage dealt.

(Only one Elixir effect may be active at a time.)

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b04.name: Last Whisper
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b04.description:
+10 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +35% Bonus Armor Penetration

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a7a.name: Entropy Field
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a7a.description:
Stun minions and slow champions in an area.

Places an Entropy Field at target location for 5 seconds. Enemy minions and Siege Ballistas trapped in the field are unable to move or attack while in the field. Enemy champions in the field have their Movement Speed reduced by 25%.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a17.description:
+55 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Blackout: When spotted by an enemy ward, causes a blackout for 8 seconds, revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling wards (90 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive - Nightstalker: After being unseen for at least 1 second, your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals 65 - 320 bonus physical damage and slows them by 99% for 0.25 seconds. Ranged attacks deal 45 - 300 bonus damage instead and do not slow. (Lasts for 5 seconds after being seen by an enemy champion).

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f4.name: Wooglet's Witchcap

+100 Ability Power

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).

Caps at +750 Mana.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f2.name: Stopwatch
5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f2.description: <active>UNIQUE Active - Stasis:</active> Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (One time use).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b17.name: Iceborn Gauntlet
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b17.description:
+65 Armor
+20% Cooldown Reduction
+500 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 100% of base Attack Damage in an area and creates an icy zone for 2 seconds that slows Movement Speed by 30% (1.5 second cooldown).

Size of zone increases with bonus armor.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2aa6.name: Sweeping Lens (Trinket)
59f3af888bf5501e050f2aa6.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Scans an area for 6 seconds, warning against hidden hostile units and revealing invisible traps and revealing / disabling wards (90 to 60 second cooldown).

Cast range and sweep radius gradually improve with level.

(Switching to a Totem-type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b70.name: Thornmail
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b70.description:
+250 Health
+80 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Thorns: Upon being hit by a basic attack, reflects magic damage equal to 10% of your bonus Armor plus 25, inflicting Grievous Wounds on the attacker for 1 second.
UNIQUE Passive - Cold Steel: When hit by basic attacks, reduces the attacker's Attack Speed by 15% for 1 second.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b43.name: Seeker's Armguard
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b43.description:
+30 Armor
+20 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Killing a unit grants 0.5 bonus Armor and Ability Power. This bonus stacks up to 30 times.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2acf.name: Hunter's Potion
59f3af888bf5501e050f2acf.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge.

(Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b61.name: Molten Edge
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b61.description:
+100 Attack Damage
+20% Critical Strike Chance

UNIQUE Passive: Critical strike bonus damage is increased by 50%.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2ac9.name: Fire at Will
59f3af888bf5501e050f2ac9.description:
Requires 500 Silver Serpents.

UNIQUE Passive: Cannon Barrage fires at an increasing rate over time (additional 6 waves over the duration).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2af8.name: Guardian's Horn
59f3af888bf5501e050f2af8.description:
+150 Health

Passive: Restores 20 Health every 5 seconds.
UNIQUE Passive: Blocks 12 damage from attacks and spells from champions (25% effectiveness vs. damage over time abilities).

Limited to 1 Guardian's Item.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2af9.name: Quicksilver Sash
59f3af888bf5501e050f2af9.description:
+30 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Active - Quicksilver: Removes all crowd control debuffs (90 second cooldown).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2aa0.name: Mikael's Crucible
59f3af888bf5501e050f2aa0.description:
+40 Magic Resist
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+100% Base Mana Regen

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Heal and Shield Power
UNIQUE Passive - Harmony: Grants bonus % Base Health Regen equal to your bonus % Base Mana Regen.
UNIQUE Active: Cleanses all stuns, roots, taunts, fears, silences, and slows on an allied champion and grants them slow immunity for 2 seconds (120 second cooldown).

Cleansing an effect grants the ally 40% movement speed for 2 seconds.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f0.name: Slightly Magical Boots
5a04acf28bf550a791fc59f0.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive: +10 Movement Speed

Boots that build from Slightly Magical Boots retains the Phasing passive and cost 50 gold less.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6c.name: Port Pad
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6c.description:
Deploy an additional teleport target.

Places a Port Pad at target location. After a 4 second delay, it activates, allowing you or your allies to teleport to it from base.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b27.name: Enchantment: Runic Echoes
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b27.description:
+60 Ability Power
+7% Movement Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Echo: Gain charges upon moving or casting. At 100 charges, the next damaging spell hit expends all charges to deal 60 (+10% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage to up to 4 targets on hit.

This effect deals 250% damage to Large Monsters. Hitting a Large Monster with this effect will restore 15% of your missing Mana.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1f.name: Gargoyle Stoneplate
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1f.description:
+40 Armor
+40 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Stone Skin: If 3+ enemy champions are nearby, grants 40 bonus Armor and Magic Resist.
UNIQUE Active - Metallicize: Increases Health by 40% and increases champion size, but reduces damage dealt by 60% for 4 seconds (92 second cooldown). If Stone Skin is active, the Health increase becomes 100% instead.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1b.name: Zhonya's Hourglass
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a1b.description:
+70 Ability Power
+45 Armor
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active - Stasis: Champion becomes invulnerable and untargetable for 2.5 seconds, but is unable to move, attack, cast spells, or use items during this time (120 second cooldown).

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a11.name: Pilfered Health Potion
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a11.description: <consumable>Click to Consume:</consumable> Restores 50 Health over 5 seconds.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a03.name: Mana Potion
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a03.description:
Limited to 5 at one time.

Click to Consume: Restores 100 Mana over 15 seconds.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2afa.name: The Dark Seal
59f3af888bf5501e050f2afa.description:
+15 Ability Power
+25% Increased Healing from Potions
+100 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Dread: Grants +3 Ability Power per Glory.
UNIQUE Passive - Do or Die: Grants 2 Glory for a champion kill or 1 Glory for an assist, up to 10 Glory total. Lose 4 Glory on death.

59f49f268bf5501e050f4c63.name: Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge)
59f49f268bf5501e050f4c63.description:
+80 Ability Power
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Awe: Grants Ability Power equal to 3% of maximum Mana. Refunds 25% of Mana spent.
UNIQUE Passive - Mana Charge: Grants +12 maximum Mana (max +750 Mana) for each spell cast or Mana expenditure (occurs up to 3 times every 12 seconds).

Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +750 Mana.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6a.name: Siege Teleport
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a6a.description: <unique>Active:</unique> Use this trinket to teleport to one of your team's port pads. Can only be used from the summoning platform.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2abd.name: Death's Daughter
59f3af888bf5501e050f2abd.description:
Requires 500 Silver Serpents.

UNIQUE Passive: Cannon Barrage additionally fires a mega-cannonball at center of the Barrage, dealing 300% true damage and slowing them by 60% for 1.5 seconds.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b30.name: Sheen
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b30.description:
+250 Mana
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals bonus physical damage equal to 100% base Attack Damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b3b.name: Sunfire Cape
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b3b.description:
+425 Health
+60 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage per second to nearby enemies. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a06.name: Boots of Mobility
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a06.description:
Limited to 1 pair of boots.

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +115 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.

5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a08.name: Poacher's Dirk
5a04acf28bf550a791fc5a08.description:
+10 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Headhunter: After killing any enemy, your next damaging spell will deal 40 bonus physical damage (30 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive: After poaching 4 large monsters from the enemy jungle, transforms into a Serrated Dirk.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2a7e.name: Head of Kha'Zix
59f3af888bf5501e050f2a7e.description:
UNIQUE Active - Scrying: Reveals a small location within 4000 range for 2 seconds. Enemy champions found will be revealed for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown).

UNIQUE Passive - Mementos of the Hunt: Rengar collects trophies when killing Champions and gains bonus effects based on how many trophies he has. Kills and assists grant 1 trophy.

3 Trophies: Rengar gains 25 Movement Speed whilst out of combat or in brush.
6 Trophies: Increases the range of Rengar's Leap by 125.
12 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's duration is increased by 5 seconds.
20 Trophies: Thrill of the Hunt's Movement Speed while stealthed is doubled.

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b54.name: Dead Man's Plate
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b54.description:
+425 Health
+60 Armor

UNIQUE Passive - Dreadnought: While moving, build stacks of Momentum, increasing movement speed by up to 60 at 100 stacks. Momentum decays while under the effect of a slow, stun, taunt, fear, polymorph, or immobilize effect, as well as when basic attacking.
UNIQUE Passive - Crushing Blow: Basic attacks at 100 stacks deal 100 bonus damage and discharge the stacks. If the attacker is melee, they also slow the target by 50% for 1 second.

''There's only one way you'll get this armor from me...'' - forgotten namesake

59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0b.name: Hextech Protobelt-01
59f3af888bf5501e050f2b0b.description:
+300 Health
+60 Ability Power
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Active - Fire Bolt: Dash forward and unleash a nova of fire bolts that deal 75 - 150 (+25% of your Ability Power) as magic damage (40 second cooldown, shared with other Hextech items).

Champions and Monsters hit by multiple fire bolts take 10% damage per additional bolt.

(This dash cannot pass through terrain.)

59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6c.name: Enchantment: Cinderhulk
59f3af898bf5501e050f2b6c.description:
+300 Health
+20% Bonus Health

UNIQUE Passive - Immolate: Deals 11 (+1 per champion level) magic damage a second to nearby enemies while in combat. Deals 200% bonus damage to minions and monsters.
